manzils.text: A wid iumnen! Eîîfet deg iâahden nnwen. Ëellen awen lmal n tejlibt, kkes ed wid i wen nnan. Ur awen têell ara ûûyada, mara têuoem. Öebbi, s tidep, Ippameô ayen i S ihwan

A wid iumnen! Ur ssiôxiset isekkiren n Öebbi, aggur iôqan, îêegga, snaoeq, wid iteddun ar Uxxam n Lêaôam, saramen lfevl akked llza n Mass nnsen. Üegdet mi tfukkem. Xas tcuênem agdud i wen igedlen Loamaâ n Lêaôam, ur iwata ara a pzegrem tilas. Mâawanet ar yise$ akked uêezzeb, ur ppemâawanet ar ubekkav akked lbe$wv. Ëezzbet i Öebbi. S tidep, Öebbi Iwâaô deg uâaqeb

I wen ipwagedlen d loifa, idim, aksum n yilef, wayen ipwamezlen i war Öebbi, ayen ippuxenqen, ayen i pwaûerâan, ayen igrarben, ayen ippuberrzen, ayen içça lweêc - siwa ma tessawvem tezlam t -, îêegga i tezôa, aseqdec n tseqqaôt. Ayagi d ucmit. Assa, wid ijehlen uysen si ddin nnwen. Ur ten ppagwadet, agwadet iyI. Assa, Nnekmale$ awen ddin nnwen, Tame$ awen l$it iW, Öuva$ awen annuz d ddin. Win terra tmara di tegwnip n llaé, ur iffi$ abrid, Öebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu

A k steqsayen acu i sen iêellen. Ini: "iêell awen wayen imaânen. Ayen d teppawin s lewêuc ipûeggiden. Tesêefvem asen ayen i wen Isseêfev Öebbi. Eççet seg wayen i wen d îîfen, mmektit ed fellas isem n Öebbi". Ëezzbet i Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, Ip$awal deg uqeîîi

Assa, iêell awen wayen imaânen. Iêell awen lqut n wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, - iêell asen lqut nnwen -; tilawin tiêuôiyin iumnen, tilawin tiêuôiyin seg wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, uqbel nnwen, ma tefkam asent tuççit nnsent; d uwqimen maççi d ucmiten, ur teppeddum d temddukwal. Win iugin liman, mêan igiten is. Neppa, di laxeôt, seg imexsuôen

A wid iumnen! Ma tekkrem ar téallit, ssirdet udmawen nnwen, ifassen nnwen alamma d ti$wmaô, sâaddit ifassen illexsen $ef iqweôôa nnwen, ssirdet ivaôen nnwen ar twelza. Ma tellam s loanaba, zzizdget. Ma tuvnem ne$ tunagem, ne$ iusa d yiwen segwen si ccicma, ne$ tennulem tilawin, ur tufim aman, ddmet akal zeddigen, sâaddit ep $ef udmawen nnwen akked ifassen nnwen. Ur Ib$a ara Öebbi a kwen Iqelleq, maca Ib$a a kwen Izzizdeg, ad awen Itim l$it iS, amar a pesnemmrem
Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Öebbi, akked nnesba ikwen Inuseb, mi tennam: "nesla u nunez". Ëezzbet i Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, Issen i illan deg idmaren
A wid iumnen! Illit d ôôsem ar Öebbi, d inagan at lmizan. Ur kwen issencaf dd$el n ugdud, ur twezznem. Wezznet. Lmizan iqôeb aîas ar uêezzeb. Ëezzbet i Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, Issen ayen txeddmem
Iâahed Öebbi ssmaê akked warraz ameqwôaêan, i wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan
Wid ijehlen u skaddben issekniyen nne£, widak d at ujajiê
A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Öebbi, amek agdud ipheggi iman is, ad isâaddi afus is fellawen. Iîîef akin ifassen nnsen, segwen. Ëezzbet i Öebbi. £ef Öebbi ara ppeklen lmumnin

Ni$ Irra Öebbi laâqed i At Isôail. Nessuffe$ ed, segsen, mrawsin imvebbôen. Inna Öebbi: "Nek yidwen ma téullem, tzekkam, tumnem s imazanen iW, u tâawnem ten, tôevlem i Öebbi aôeîîal igerzen. War ccekk, ad awen Kkse$ tucmitin nnwen, a kwen Skecme$ di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Win ijehlen segwen, deffir waya, ni$ innetlaf seg ubrid umâin

Imi ooan laâqed nnsen, Nexza ten, Nesgursel ulawen nnsen. Ssexsaôen inumak n wawalen, ppun amur n wayen i$ef pwafekkôen. Mazal a d temlilev d lexdaâ nnsen, siwa drus segsen. Semmeê asen u ssuref. Öebbi, s tidep, Iêemmel iâaôviyen
Wid iqqaôen: "nekwni d imasiêiyen", Nerra laâqed yidsen, ppun amur n wayen i$ef pwafekkôen. Nessker ed, garasen, taâdawt akked dd$el, ar ass n tnekra. Deqqal a ten Ixebbeô Öebbi $ef wayen la ûenâan
A yAt Tezmamt! Ni$ iusa kwen id Umazan nne£. Ad awen ibeggen aîas n wayen la teppeffrem, n Tezmamt. Ad Ipsemmiê i waîas. Ni$ tusa kwen id tafat s$uô Öebbi, akked Tezmamt ipbegginen
Inehhu yis Öebbi, ar iberdan n tifrat, wid iôe$ben llza S. A ten Issuffe$ si tillas ar tafat, s tsriê iS. A ten Inhu s abrid uwqim

Ni$ jehlen wid innan: "Öebbi, s tidep, d lmasiê, mmi s n Meryem". Ini: "anwa isâan kra n lkwelf, s$uô Öebbi, ma ihwa yaS ad Ine$ lmasiê, mmi s n Meryem, imma s, akked wayen akw illan di tmurt"? N Öebbi tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Öebbi Izmer i yal cci

Udayen akked imasiêiyen, nnan: "nekwni d tarwa n Öebbi, d wid Ismenyaf". Ini: "acimi, ihi, ikwen Ipâaqab $ef ibekkaven nnwen? Xaîi, kunwi d imexlaq am wiyav". Ad Isemmeê i win i S ihwan, ad Iâaqeb win i S ihwan. N Öebbi tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Taggara $uôeS

A yAt Tezmamt! Ni$ iusa kwen id Umazan nne£, ad awen ibeggen, mi tâadda tallit war imazanen. Akka ur d teqqaôem ara: "ur a$ d iusi ubeccaô, ne$ uneddaô". Ihi, iusa kwen id ubeccaô, uneddaô. Öebbi Izmer i yal cci
Mi inna Musa i ugdud is: "a yagdud iw! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Öebbi. Irra segwen lambiyya, Irra kwen d igeldan. Ifka yawen ayen ur Ifki i yiwen, deg imavalen
A yagdud iw! Kecmet akal iôqan, i wen Iura Öebbi. Ur d ppu$alet $er deffir wen, a d tegwrim txesôem
Nnan: "a Musa! Degs agdud iâafriten, nekwni ur p nkeççem, d awez$i, alamma ff$en d segs. Mi d ff$en segs, a nekcem
Sin irgazen, seg wid iugaden - Isâad iten Öebbi -, nnan: "kecmet $uôsen si tebburt; ma tkecmem, kunwi, ih, a prebêem. Ppeklet af Öebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Nnan: "a Musa! Nekwni ur p nkeççem, d awez$i, skud mazal iten degs. Öuê, keçç d Mass ik, nna$et. Nekwni a neqqim dagi
Inna: "a Mass iw! Ay melke$, nek, siwa iman iw akked gma; ihi, Semfaôeq a$ d ugdud
Inna: "ihi, tamurt agi tepwagdel asen. Ukuéet iseggwasen ad menîaôen di lberr. Ur $webben $ef ugdud iballa$en
Eêku yasen, s tidep, taqûit n sin warrac n Adem, mi îêeggan i sin. S$uô yiwen tepwaqbel. S$uô wayev ur tepwaqbel ara. Inna: "war ccekk, a k n$e$". Inna: "Iqebbel kan Öebbi îêegga s$uô wid ipêezziben
Ma ibbwev iyi d ufus ik, ad iyi ten$ev, nek, ur k id ippawev ufus iw, a k n$e$. Nek, ppagwade$ Öebbi, Mass imavalen
Nek, b$i$ a ppawiv abekkav iw, akked ubekkav ik, a ppiliv seg wat tmes. Winna d aqeîîi imednas
Iaâzem, deg iman is, ad ine$ gma s, d$a in$a t. Igwra d seg imexsuôen
Iuzen ed Öebbi tagerfa, tkeôôev akal, iwakken ad as tessenâat amek ara i$umm loeppa n gma s. Inna: "a ssexv iw! Ur bbwive$ ad ili$ am tgerfa yagi, ad $umme$ loeppa n gma". Igwra d seg wid inedmen

Ilmend n waya, Nura i At Isôail, ar win in$an amdan ur nen$i yiwen, ur nessefsed di tmurt, amzun in$a imdanen meôôa. Win issadren yiwen, amzun issader imdanen meôôa. Ni$ usan ten id imazanen nne£, s ubeggen. Sinna, deffir waya, s tidep, aîas degsen ssuguten di tmurt

Aqeîîi n wid ipna$en Öebbi akked Umazan iS, u ssenkaren asefsed di tmurt, siwa timen$iwt, ne$ asemmeô $ef umidag, ne$ anegzum ufus sya, uvaô sya, ne$ anfay si tmurt. Ayagi, d aqeîîi nnsen di ddunit. Di laxeôt, fellasen aâaqeb ameqwôaêan
Kkes ed wid inedmen, uqbel a pvebbôem fellasen. Cfut ar Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
A wid iumnen! Ëezzbet i Öebbi, nadit a pqeôôbem $uôeS, nna$et deg ubrid iS, amar a prebêem
Ih, wid ijehlen, xas ad sâun i illan akw di tmurt, rnu yas win i t icban, iwakken ad fdun, yis, iman nnsen seg uâaqeb, ass n tnekra, ur ipwaqbal segsen. Fellasen aâaqeb aqeôêan
Ad b$un a d ff$en si tmes, ur llin d wid id iteff$en. Fellasen aâaqeb imezgi
Amakwar, tamakwart, gezmet asen ifassen nnsen, d aqeîîi n wayen xedmen, d aâaqeb s$uô Öebbi. Öebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Win inedmen, deffir ddens is, u iu$al d aâôvi, ad as Issuref Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Day ur teéôiv ara n Öebbi tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan? Ipâaqab win i S ihwan, Ipsemmiê i win i S ihwan. Öebbi Izmer i yal cci

A Nnbi! Ur k $weblen wid ip$awalen ar tijehli, seg wid iqqaôen numen, s imawen nnsen, ur uminen wulawen nnsen, seg wudayen issemêasen i tikerkas, issemêasen i ugdud nniven, ur d nusi $uôek. Pbeddilen awalen deffir ussefhem nnsen. Qqaôen: "ma ippunefk awen d waya, ddemt ep; ma ur awen d ippunefk ara, $uôwat"! Win Ib$a Öebbi a t Ihewwel, ur t tepsellikev, s wacemma, seg ufus n Öebbi. Widak, d wid iwumi ur Ib$a ara Öebbi, ad izdigen wulawen nnsen. Di ddunit ad pwaxzun. Di laxeôt fellasen aâaqeb abarar
Wid issemêasen i tikerkas, iteppen leêôam, ma usan k id, fru garasen, ne$ eoo iten. Ma teooiv ten, ur k îîuôôun s wacemma. Ma têuddev, êudd garasen s lmizan. Öebbi, s tidep, Iêemmel wid iweznen
Amek ara k id asen, s aêuddu, u nitni sâan Tuôa, degs aêuddu n Öebbi? Sinna, deffir waya, ad wexxôen. Ur llin wigi si lmumnin

Ih, Nessers ed Tuôa, degs nnhaya akked tafat, ferrun yis ger wudayen, lambiyya imvuâen. U iôabaniyen akked lecyux seg wayen jemâen, si Tezmamt n Öebbi, u llan d inagan is. Ur ppagwadet imdanen, agwadet iyI. Ur d ppa$et, s issekniyen iW, ayen ôxisen. Wid ur nepêuddu yara s wayen id Issers Öebbi, widak d ijehliyen

Nura yasen degs: ôôuê s ôôuê, tiî s tiî, anzaren s wanzaren, ameééu$ s umeééu$, tu$mest s tu$mest, leoruê ad ppuêesben. Win iooan, d le$ôama s. Wid ur nepêuddu yara s wayen id Issers Öebbi, widak d imednas

Nuzen ed, deffir sen, Âisa, mmi s n Meryem, a d itebbet ayen it id izwaren di Tuôa. Nefka yas Linoil, degs nnhaya akked tafat, a d itebbet ayen it id izwaren di Tuôa. D nnhaya u d anabi i wid ipêezziben
At Linoil, iwata ad êudden s wayen id Issers, degs, Öebbi. Wid ur nêudd ara s wayen id Issers Öebbi, widak d iballa$en

Nessers ak d Tazmamt, s tidep, a d tebbet ayen ip id izwaren n Tezmamt. Nvemn ip. Ihi, êudd garasen s wayen id Issers Öebbi. Ur teddu d lhawiyyat nnsen, beôôa n wayen i k id iusan n tidep. I yal wa, Nefka lqanun akked ubrid. Lemmer i S ihwi i Öebbi, yili Irra kwen d yiwen n lois. Maca, iwakken a kwen Ijeôôeb $ef wayen i wen Ifka, mzizlet ar lxiô. Ar Öebbi tu$alin nnwen akw. A kwen Ixebbeô $ef wayen tellam temgarradem

Ëudd garasen s wayen id Issers Öebbi. Ur teddu d lhawiyyat nnsen. £uôek a k hewwlen $ef kra seg wayen i k d Issers Öebbi. Ma wexxôen, éeô ar Öebbi Ib$a kan a ten Iwwet $ef kra ibekkaven nnsen. Ih, aîas n medden d iballa$en
Day b$an aêuddu n zzman n war tussna? Anwa yifen Öebbi d Amêaddi, i ugdud ineûêen liman
A wid iumnen! Ur pparat, d iêbiben, udayen akked imasiêiyen. Garasen d iêbiben. Win, segwen, i ten irran d iêbiben, ad yili segsen. Öebbi, s tidep, ur Inehhu agdud imednas
A pwaliv imuvan n wul, ppazzalen $uôsen, qqaôen asen: "nugad ay d itezzin fella$". Ahat a d Ias Öebbi s l$elb, ne$ s lameô s$uôeS. A d gwrin di nndama, $ef wayen ffren deg iman nnsen
A d inin wid iumnen: "day d wigi i iggullen s Öebbi, tagallit meqqwôen, ar nitni llan yidwen"? Mêan igiten nnsen, gwran d d imexsuôen

A wid iumnen! Win segwen iooan ddin is…, ihi, deqqal Öebbi a d Iawi agdud Iêemmel, i T iêemmlen; ad ôavin lmumnin, ad qesêen ar ijehliyen. Ad nna$en deg ubrid n Öebbi. Ur ppagwaden alummu n win iplummun. Ayagi d lfevl n Öebbi, Ippak it i win i S ihwan. Öebbi d Ajemmal, d Amusnaw
Imawlan nnwen siwa Öebbi akked Umazan iS, wid iumnen, wid ipéallan, pzekkin, u nitni îîinizen
Wid irran d imawlan nnsen, Öebbi, Amazan iS, akked wid iumnen…, ih, akabar n Öebbi, d nitni ara irebêen
A wid iumnen! Ur pparat d iêbiben wid id ilhan, di ddin nnwen, s wurar d utihi, seg wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, uqbel nnwen, akw seg ijehliyen. Ëezzbet i Öebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ma teddnem i téallit, fellas ad mmaâlken, ad uraren. Ayagi, acku nitni d agdud ur nefhim
Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Acu i$ef la $ ttehmem, siwa imi numen s Öebbi, akked wayen id Issers $uône$, akked wayen id Issers uqbel? Tegwti degwen d iballa$en

Ini: "ad awen mle$ aqeîîi n Öebbi icemten sennig wagi? Wid Ixza Öebbi, sserfan T, Irra ten d iddawen, d ilfawen". Âabden iôebbiten n tkerkas. Widak, atnan di liêala tucmip mavi, di ttelfan u$miq seg ubrid uûwib
Mi d usan $uôwen, qqaôen: "numen". Ni$ kecmen d s tijehli, u nitni ff$en yis. Öebbi Yif akw akken Issen, ayen teffren
La tepwaliv aîas, degsen, p$awalen ar ubekkav akked wanfal, teppen leêôam. I icmet wayen xeddmen
A lemmer i sen kksen iôabiyen akked lecyax, awal ubekkav akked wuççi n leêôam? I icmet wayen la ûenâen

Qqaôen wudayen: "iskkweô ufus n Öebbi". D ifassen nnsen i isekkwôen. Pwaxzan ilmend n wayen d qqaôen. Xaîi! Ifassen iS llin, Ip$iti akken i S ihwa. Ayen i k d irsen, s$uô Mass ik, war ccekk, irennu i waîas segsen, leb$wev akked tijehli. Nessker garasen cceêna, akked dd$el, ar ass n tnekra. Yal tikelt ara caâlen times i îôad, a p Issexsi Öebbi. Pnadin asefsed di tmurt. Öebbi ur Iêemmel ara ifessaden
At Tezmamt, lemmer day umnen u êezzben, yili, war ccekk, Nekkes asen tucmitin nnsen, u Nesskecm iten ar leonanat isaâdiyen
Lemmer day îîifen di Tuôa akked Linoil, akked wayen i sen d irsen s$uô Mass nnsen, war ccekk, ad ççen sennig sen, akw seddaw ivaôen nnsen. Illa garasen lois iôeznen. Aîas, degsen, dirit wayen xeddmen
A yAmazan, mel ayen i k d irsen, s$uô Mass ik. Ma ur t temliv ara, ur tessawvev ara tabrap iS. Öebbi a k Ifukk si l$aci. Öebbi, s tidep, ur Inehhu agdud ijehliyen

Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Ur tellim deg wacemma, alamma teddam d Tuôa, Linoil, akked wayen i wen d irsen, s$uô Mass nnwen". Ayen i k d irsen s$uô Mass ik, war ccekk, irennu, i waîas segsen, leb$wev akked tijehli. Ur $webbel $ef ugdud ijehliyen
Ih, wid iumnen, udayen, iûabiyen, imasiêiyen, wid iumnen s Öebbi akked wass aneggaru, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Ni$ Nga laâqed i At Isôail, Nuzen asen imazanen. Yal tikelt ara ten id ias umazan s wayen ur asen nehwi, wa a t skiddben, wa a t n$en
£ilen ur ippili uhewwel. Dre$len, âaégen. Sinna, Issuref asen Öebbi. Sinna, aîas degsen dre$len, âaégen. Öebbi Ipwali acu xeddmen

Ni$ jehlen wid iqqaôen: "Öebbi, s tidep, d lmasiê, mmi s n Meryem". U inna lmasiê: "a yAt Isôail! Âabdet Öebbi, Mass iw, d Mass nnwen". Ih, win icerken i Öebbi, Igdel as Öebbi Loennet. Axxam is d times. Ur llin isellaken i imednas
Ni$ jehlen wid iqqaôen: "Ih, Öebbi d wis krav n krav". Ur illi ôebbi siwa Öebbi Yiwen. Ma ur xvin ara i wayen qqaôen, war ccekk, aâaqeb aqeôêan ad iêaz wid ijehlen segsen
Day ur tuben ara ar Öebbi, u ssuturen aS ssmaê? Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Lmasiê, mmi s n Meryem, d amazan kan. Ni$ âaddan, uqbel is, imazanen. Imma s tessawal tidep. Llan teppen lqut. Wali amek i asen Nepbeggin issekniyen; sinna, wali amek la ppagwin
Ini: "day a ppaâbdem, war Öebbi, ayen ur nezmir a kwen ivuôô, ne$ a kwen infaâ"? Öebbi, Neppa, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Ur rennut, di ddin nnwen, ayen ur nelli d tidep. Ur teddut d lemcihwat n ugdud innetlafen zik, i itelfen aîas, u telfen seg ubrid uûwib
Pwaxzan wid ijehlen, seg wAt Isôail, s$uô iles n Dawed akked Âisa, mmi s n Meryem; ayagi, $ef wayen âuûan, u zgaren tilas
Ur ppemyekkasen ayen xedmen n dir. I icmet wayen xeddmen
A pwaliv aîas segsen, ad xalven wid ijehlen. War ccekk, icmet wayen xedmen i iman nnsen. Ad Izâaf Öebbi fellasen. Nitni ad wekkôen deg uâaqeb
Lemmer uminen s Öebbi, Nnbi, akked wayen i sen d irsen, ur ten pparan d iêbiben. Maca aîas, segsen, d iballa$en

A ppafev icenga iqeûêanen mavi, n wid iumnen, d udayen akked wid ipcaraken. A ppafev wid iqeôben mavi, s lmaênana, ar wid iumnen, d wid innan: "nekwni d imasiêiyen". Ayagi, acku llan degsen ixelwiyen, iôehbaniyen, u nitni ur sme$wôen ara iman nnsen
Ma slan i wayen id iusan ar Umazan, a pwaliv allen nnsen ççuôent d imeîîi, seg wayen ufan n tidep. Qqaôen: "a Mass nne$! Numen, Aru ya$ seg inagan
Acu i $ iu$en ur numin s Öebbi akked wayen i $ d iusan n tidep; ur nessarem a $ Issekcem, Mass nne$, s agdud iâaôviyen
A ten Ioazi Öebbi, $ef wayen d qqaôen, s leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkôen. Wagi d aoazi n lâuûam
Wid ijehlen, u skaddben issekniyen nne£, widak, d at Loahennama
A wid iumnen! Ur pgeddilet ayen imaânen i wen Iêell Öebbi. Ur zegret tilas. Öebbi, s tidep, ur Iêemmel ara wid izegren tilas
Eççet seg wayen ikwen Iôéeq Öebbi, iêellen, imaânen. Ëezzbet i Öebbi. YiS, kunwi, ay tumnem

Ur kwen Ipqassa Öebbi $ef tgallit n tkerkas. Maca, a kwen Iqiss $ef tgallit n ûûeê. Takweffaôt is: a ppecceççem mraw ime$ban, akken tecceççam tawacult nnwen, ne$ a ten tesselsem, ne$ a pserêem i wakli. Win ur nwâa ara, ad iuéum krav wussan. D tagi ay d takweffaôt n tgallit nnwen, ma teggullem. Eîîfet di tgallit nnwen. Akka i wen d Ipbeggin Öebbi issekniyen, amar a ppesnemmrem
A wid iumnen! Ccôab, leqwmeô, tiâancuôin, taseqqaôt, d ayen kan icemten, seg igi n Cciîan. Ihi, veôôeft asen, amar a prebêem
Ib$a kan Cciîan ad isker ticenga akked dd$el garawen, s ccôab akked leqwmeô, a kwen iveôôef seg usmekti n Öebbi, akked téallit. Day ur tepfukkum ara
A$et awal i Öebbi, a$et awal i Umazan. £uôwat! Ma twexxôem, cfut ar Amazan, iwata yas kan anabi ipbegginen
Ur telli tiyta deg wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, $ef wayen ççan, ma êezzben, umnen, xedmen ayen ilhan, sinna êezzben, umnen, sinna, êezzben u maânen. Öebbi Iêemmel lâuûam

A wid iumnen! War ccekk, a kwen Iweddeb Öebbi $ef wayen tepûeggidem s ifassen nnwen, u s ixtucen nnwen, iwakken ad Iéeô Öebbi anwa i T ippagwaden, di tbavnit. Win izegren tilas, deffir waya, fellas aâaqeb aqeôêan

A wid iumnen! Ur pûeggidet di zzyaôa nnwen. Win iûeggden segwen, u iâammed, aqeîîi: ad iseddeq, si lmal is, ayen in$a s ûûyada s, a d êudden, f waya, sin irgazen iêesbiyen segwen. D tikci ara iawven ar Lkaâba. Ne$ takweffaôt: ad icceçç ime$ban, ne$, ayen iswan aya, ad iuéum. Ad ijeôôeb vveôô n lameô is. Öebbi Isemmeê i wayen iâaddan. Win iu$alen a d Irr Öebbi segs ppaô. Öebbi d Uzmir, Ippara d ppaô
Têell awen ûûyada n yill akked uççi s. D lqut i kunwi akw iminigen. Tepwagdel awen ûûyada di tmurt, skud aql akwen d zziyyaô. Ëezzbet i Öebbi, $uôeS ara tepwafesrem
Irra Öebbi Lkaâba d axxam iôqan ipwabnan i l$aci, aggur iôqan, asfel, isenoaq, ayagi iwakken a ppeéôem ar Öebbi Iéôa i illan deg igenwan u di tmurt, u Öebbi Issen yal cci
Cfut iwâaô uâaqeb n Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Amazan, iwata yas kan unabi. Öebbi Iéôa ayen temmalem u ayen teppeffrem
Ini: "ur iaâdil ara wayen n dir akked wayen imaânen", xas teswehm ik lkwetôa n wayen n dir. Ëezzbet i Öebbi, a yuâqilen, amar a prebêem
A wid iumnen! Ur steqsayet $ef t$awsiwin ara kwen icwe$ben, ma mlan awen tent. Ma testeqsam fellasent mara d iprusu Leqwôan, ad awen ppufessrent. Öebbi Isemmeê aya. Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Iêellem
Ni$ isteqsa fellasent ugdud, uqbel nnwen. Sinna, segsent, gwran d d ijehliyen
Ur d Ifki Öebbi Baêiôa, ne$ Sayba, ne$ Waûila, ne$ Ëami. Maca, wid ijehlen gren d tikerkas $ef Öebbi. Tegwti degsen ur fhimen
Ma nnan asen: "yyaw ar wayen id Issers Öebbi, u ar Umazan". Qqaôen: "beôka ya$ ayen id nufa, $ef waya, $eô imezwura nne$". I ma imezwura nnsen ur ssinen acemma, ur pwanhan
A wid iumnen! Fellawen iman nnwen. Ur kwen iîîuôôu win innetlafen, ma tepwanham. Ar Öebbi, tu$alin nnwen akw. A kwen Ixebbeô $ef wayen txeddmem

A wid iumnen! Ccada garawen, ma tusa d tmeppant ar yiwen segwen. Di lawan uweûûi, sin irgazen iêesbiyen, segwen, ne$ wiyav war segwen, ma tellam d iminigen di tmurt, u tusa kwen id twa$it n tmeppant. A ten qesden deffir téallit. Ma tcukkem, sgallet pen s Öebbi: "ur d nesfayday syis, xas iaâna llzem nne$, ur nteffer ccada n Öebbi, mulac, nekwni a nili seg imednab
Ma ivehô ed fellasen denben, ad ppuneûfen s wiyav, si loiha n wid vuôôen imezwura. Ad ggalen s Öebbi: "ih, ccada nne$ tif ccada nnsen. Ur nzegger tilas, mulac, war ccekk, a nili seg imednas
Ppif akka iwakken a d awin ccada iwulmen, ad agwaden a ppili tgallit deffir tgallit nnsen. Ëezzbet i Öebbi, ssemêesset, Öebbi ur Inehhu agdud iballa$en
Ass ideg ara Issemlil Öebbi imazanen, ad Yini: "acu i wen d jawben"? Ad inin: "ur telli tussna $uône$. D Keçç, s tidep, i Issnen tibavniyin

Mi Inna Öebbi: "a Âisa, mmi s n Meryem! Mmekti d i kwen £$ate$, keçç akked imma k, mi k Âiwne$ s ôôuê iôqan. Tepmmeslayev i medden si dduê, am unqaqôi. Mi k Slemde$ Tazmamt, ûûwab, Tuôa, Linoil. Mi tûenâav, si talaxt, ûûifa n ufrux, s– tsriê iW; tûuvev degs, tu$al d afôux, s– tsriê iW. Tesseêlayev agugam, amuvin n lberû, s– tsriê iW. Mi tessenkarev lmeggtin, s– tsriê iW. Mi Sbaâde$ fellak At Isôail, mi d tusiv $uôsen, s ubeggen, u nnan wid ijehlen segsen: "ayagi iban d ssêur kan
Mi Weêêa$ i inmahalen: "amnet yissI, akw s umazan iW". Nnan: "numen. Echhed ar nekwni d imvuâen
Mi nnan inmahalen: "a Âisa, mmi s n Meryem! Ma Izmer Mass ik ad a$ d Issers lmaida seg igenni"? Inna: "êezzbet i Öebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Nnan: "neb$a a neçç segs, a nevmen ulawen nne$, a néeô ar tenniv a$ d tidep, a nili d inagan iS
Inna Âisa, mmi s n Meryem: "a Öebbi, Mass nne$, Ssers a$ d lmaida, seg igenni, ad a$ tili d lâid i umezwaru u i uneggaru nne$, u d assekni s $uôeK. £it a$ d. Keçç, Tifev akw im$iten
Inna Öebbi: "ad awen p id Sserse$. Win ijehlen segwen, deffir waya, a t Âaqbe$ aâaqeb ur Sâadda$ i yiwen deg imavalen

Mi Inna Öebbi: "a Âisa, mmi s n Meryem! D keçç i innan i l$aci: erret a$, nek akked imma, d sin iôebbiten war Öebbi"? Inna: "gedha s yiseK! Ur iyi ippunefk ara a d ini$ ayen i$ef ur sâi$ lêeqq. Lemmer i t id nni$, yili Teéôiv t. Tesnev i illan deg iman iw, ur ssine$ ayen illan deg iman iK. Keçç, s tidep, d Amusnaw n tbavniyin
I asen nni$, siwa ayen iyi d Tumôev: âabdet Öebbi, Mass iw, u Mass nnwen. Lli$ d anagi nnsen, skud lli$ garasen. Mi iyi n Tessuliv $uôeK, d Keçç i ten id Iquôâan. Keçç, d Anagi n yal cci
Ma Tâaqbev ten, ni$ d imdanen iK, ma Tsemmêev asen, Keçç, s tidep, d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab

Inna Öebbi: "wagi d ass ideg ara stenfâan imawlan n tidep, si tidep nnsen. I nitni leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, ad wekkôen degsen, i lebda". Iôuva ten Öebbi, u ôuvan T, d wagi ay d rrbeê ameqwôaêan
N Öebbi tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan, akked wayen illan degsen. Neppa Izmer i yal cci
A neckeô Öebbi i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan. Irra tillas, tafat. Sinna, wid ijehlen pparan tanudda i Mass nnsen
Neppa, ikwen Ixelqen s talaxt, sinna, Iseyya lajel. £uôeS lajel ipwassnen. Deffir waya, kunwi la tepcukkum
Neppa, d Öebbi deg igenwan, di tmurt. Issen sser nnwen, d wayen d teqqaôem. Iéôa ayen tkesbem
Ur ten id ippas ussekni seg issekniyen n Mass nnsen, mebla ma ugin t
Ni$ skaddben tidep, mi ten id tusa. A ten id ias usali n wayen i$ef ttihin

Day ur walan ara acêal isuta, uqbel nnsen, ay Nekkes. Nesserked iten di tmurt akken ur kwen Nesserked. Nuzen asen aîas ugeffur, Nerra yasen isaffen, ppazzalen seddawat sen. Nesnegr iten ilmend ibekkaven nnsen. Nxelq ed, deffir sen, sself nniven
Xas ad ak ed Nessers Tazmamt, di lka$ev, ara nnalen s ifassen nnsen, war ccekk, a d inin wid ijehlen: "wagi, s tidep, siwa ssêur n ûûeê
Qqaôen: "a lemmer id irs $uôes lmelk". Lemmer a n Nessers lmelk, war ccekk, ad iûaô lameô, sinna, ur pganin
Lemmer i t Nerri d lmelk, yili Nerra t d argaz, ad as Nessels ayen plusun
Ni$ mmaâlken $ef imazanen, uqbel ik. Ayen i$ef ttihin, izzi i wid, segsen, immaâlken
Ini: "ddut di tmurt, sinna walit amek tevôa d wid iskiddiben
Ini: "w i t ilan wayen akw illan di tmurt akked igenwan"? Ini: "d Öebbi". Iura, deg iman iS, aêunu. A kwen Issemlil i wass n tnekra, ur ccekk fellas. Wid isxesôen iman nnsen, ur ppamnen
IneS i ized$en deg iv, deg wass. Neppa Issel, d Amusnaw
Ini: "day ara sâu$ bab, war Öebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan? Neppa Icceççay ur t cceççayen". Ini: "nek pwamôe$ d ad ili$ d amenzu ara ianzen. Ur ppilit seg imcurak
Ini: "nek ugade$, ma aâûa$ Mass iw, aâaqeb n wass ameqwôaêan
Win imenâan segs, assen, ni$ Iêun fellas. Wagi d rrebê n ûûeê
Ma Isâadda Öebbi fellak cedda, ur p itekkes yiwen, siwa Neppa. Ma Isrebê ik, Neppa Izmer i yal cci
D Neppa ay d Aqehhaô, sennig imdanen iS; d Neppa ay d Bab n ûûwab, i Iéôan

Ini: "anda p ccada sennig akw tiyav"? Ini: "Öebbi d Anagi gari yidwen. Iweêêa yi d Leqwôan agi, iwakken a kwen nabi$ yis, kunwi akked wid u$uô ibbwev. Day, kunwi, war ccekk, a pcehhdem ar, ar tama n Öebbi, llan iôebbiten nniven"? Ini: "ur cehhde$"! Ini: "Neppa d Öebbi, siwa Yiwen. Nek, rri$ akin ayen tepcarakem
Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, ssnen p, akken ssnen arraw nnsen. Wid isxesôen iman nnsen, ihi, ur ppamnen
Anwa idensen sennig win d igren tikerkas $ef Öebbi, ne$ iskaddben issekniyen iS? Ih, ur rebêen imednas
Ass ideg ara ten Nefser meôôa, sinna a Nini i wid icurken: "anda ten icriken nnwen, i la tâabdem
Deg uhewwel nnsen, siwa ma nnan d: "s Öebbi, Mass nne$, ur nelli d imcurak
Wali amek skaddben $ef yiman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen la d snulfuyen

Garasen wid i k issemêasen. Nerra aêurrim $ef ulawen nnsen, iwakken ur t fehmen. Tiâééegt deg imeééu$en nnsen. Ma walan yal assekni, ur ppamnen yis. Alamma, ma usan d $uôek, a k namren, ad ak inin wid ijehlen: ayagi siwa tiêkayin imezwura
Sîixxiôen segs, îîeôôifen segs. Ay squccun siwa iman nnsen, ur faqen
Lemmer a ten twaliv, mara bedden ar tmes, a d inin: a ssexv nne$! Awi $ irran, ur neskiddib issekniyen n Mass nne$! A nili si lmumnin
Xaîi! Iban asen d wayen teffren, zik. Lemmer a d kren, ad u$alen ar wayen i sen ipwagedlen. Nitni, s tidep, d ikeddaben
U qqaôen: "siwa tameddurt n ddunit i illan. Nekwni, ur fella$ tanekra
Lemmer a pwaliv mara bedden ar Mass nnsen, ad Yini: "ni$ ayagi s tidep"? A d inin: "ih, s Mass nne$"! Ad Yini: "ihi jeôôbet aâaqeb, ilmend n wayen tejhilem

Ni$ xesôen wid iskaddben timlilit akked öÖebbi. Alamma, ma iusa ten id yimir, deqzalla, a d inin: "a yamxix nne$, $ef wayen ideg nestehza"! Nitni ad bibben tiâakkwumin nnsen $ef izugar nnsen. I icmet wayen bubben
Tameddurt n ddunit d urar kan akked lhawiyya. Axxam aneggaru, war ccekk, yif ip i wid ipêezziben. Day ur tepmeyyizem ara
Ni$ Neéôa i$webben ik, s tidep, wayen qqaôen. Ihi, nitni ur k skiddiben. Maca imednas veggôen issekniyen n Öebbi
Ni$ skaddben imazanen uqbel ik. Üebôen $ef wayen i ten skaddben, akked wayen i ten meêênen, armi i ten id iusa usellek nne£. Ur illi ubeddel i wawalen n Öebbi. Ni$ usan k id, kra isallen imazanen
Ma ééay fellak uwexxeô nnsen, ma tzemôev a tessarmev aderbuz di tmurt, ne$ sellum s igenni, ad asen d tawiv assekni. Ma ihwa yaS i Öebbi, a ten Issemlil ar nnhaya. Ur ppili seg wid ur nessin
Siwa wid isellen, ara d ijawben. Lmegtin a ten id Issker Öebbi, sinna, $uôeS tu$alin nnsen
Qqaôen: "acimi ur as d irs ara ussekni s$uô Mass is"? Ini: "Öebbi, s tidep, Izmer a d Issers assekni", maca tegwti degsen ur éôin
Ur illi lweêc di tmurt, ne$ ufrux ippafgen s wafriwen is, ur nelli d leoyus am kunwi. Ur Nestehza, di Tezmamt, $ef wacemma. Sinna, ar Mass nnsen, ad pwafessren
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, âaégen, gugmen, di tillas. Win i S ihwan i Öebbi, a t Itlef. Win i S ihwan, a t Iawi d ubrid uwqim
Ini: "twalam ma iusa kwen id uâaqeb n Öebbi, ne$ ma iusa kwen id yimir, day ar war Öebbi ara tnaâôem, ma tessawalem tidep
Xaîi! £uôeS ara tnujem. Ad Issiferr ayen i$ef tnujem $uôeS, ma ihwa yaS, a ppeppum ayen tcurkem
Ni$ Nuzen ed ar leoyus, uqbel ik. Nesâadda fellasen tilufa, ccqa, amar ad êiwten
A lemmer êawten, mi ten id tusa tiyta nne£. Maca, qehôen wulawen nnsen. Cciîan Icebbeê asen ayen xeddmen
Mi ppun ayen i sen d smmektin, Nelli yasen tibbura n yal cci, armi, mi feôêen s wayen i sen ippunefken, Newwet iten, deqzalla. D$a qevâen layas
Pwakksen wid id igwran seg ugdud idensen. Ccekôan i Öebbi, Mass imavalen
Ini: "twalam, ma Iddem awen Öebbi timesliwt nnwen, akked iéôi nnwen; ma Isle$ ulawen nnwen; anwa ôebbi, war Öebbi, ar awen ten id iawin"? Wali amek Nessefham issekniyen, u nitni, sinna, zzin akin
Ini: "acu twalam, ma iusa kwen id uâaqeb n Öebbi, deqzalla, ne$ âinani? Day ara Ine$, siwa agdud imednas
Ur d Nuzen imazanen, siwa i ubecceô, d unabi. Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, a ten iêaz uâaqeb, ilmend n wayen be$wven

Ini: "ur awen qqare$ sâi$ igerrujen n Öebbi, ur ssine$ tabavnit; ur awen qqare$: nek, d lmelk. Nek, teddu$ kan akked wayen iyi d ippuweêêan". Ini: "day iaâdel uder$al d win ipwalin? Day ur d tepmeyyizem ara
Nabi yis wid iugaden ad pwafessren ar Mass nnsen. Ur sâin bab, war Neppa, ne$ amcafaâ. Amar ad êezzben
Ur ppara wid ipnujun $uô Mass nnsen, taûebêit, tameddit, pnadin udem iS. Ur fellak a ten têasbev deg wacemma, ur fellasen a k êasben, deg wacemma. Ma terriv ten, ihi, a ppiliv seg imednas
Akka ay Nhewwel kra s wiyav, iwakken a d inin: "day d wigi i I$at Öebbi, garane$"? Day ur Issin ara Öebbi, sennig akw, wid isnemmiren

Ma usan k id wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£, ini: "tifrat fellawen"! Mass nnwen Iura, i iman iS, aêunu. Ihi, i win, segwen, ixedmen tucmip, ur iâammed, sin akin, isteôoaâ, u ixdem ayen ilhan, Neppa Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Akka ay Nfeûûel issekniyen, iwakken a d iban ubrid ibe$wviyen
Ini: "nek, ippugdel iyi ad âabde$ wid u$uô la tepnujum, war Öebbi". Ini: "ur teddu$ d lemcihwat nnwen, mulac ad nnetlafe$, ur ppili$ seg wid ipwanhan
Ini: "nek, îîfe$ deg ubeggen n Mass iw. Teskaddbem t. Ur illi $uôi wayen u$uô têarem. Ih, aêuddu $eô Öebbi kan. Issawal tidep. Neppa Yif akw wid issenqaden
Ini: "lemmer illi $uôi wayen u$uô têarem, yili iûaô lameô, gari yidwen". Öebbi Yif akw akken Issen imednas
£uôeS tisura n tbavnit. Siwa Neppa itent Issnen. Iéôa i illan di lberr, di yill. Ur i$elli ifer siwa ma Iéôa t. Akken aâqqa di tillas n tmurt, tizzegzewt, ta$eôt, akw di tezmamt ipbegginen
D Neppa i wen ippaddamen leôwaê deg iv. Iéôa ay txeddmem, deg wass. Sinna, Ippara kwen id degs, iwakken ad ivôu lajel ipwassnen. Sinna, $uôeS tu$alin nnwen, sinna, a kwen Ixebbeô $ef wayen txeddmem
D Neppa ay d Aqehhaô sennig imdanen iS. Ippazen ed $uôwen imêaraben, alamma, ma tusa d tmeppant ar yiwen segwen, ad ddmen ôôuê is, imceggâen nne£. Nitni ur stehzayen
Sinna, ad u$alen ar Öebbi, Bab nnsen n tidep. Aêuddu, day maççi d ayla S? Neppa Yif akw akken Ip$awal ar uqeîîi
Ini: "anwa ara kwen Isellken si tillas n lberr d yill, u$uô tnujem s uêiwet akked tugwdi"? "Ma Isellek a$ si tagi, war ccekk, a nili seg wid isnemmiren
Ini: "Öebbi Isellek ikwen segs, akw si yal lhemm, sinna, kunwi la tepcarakem
Ini: "Neppa, Izmer ad awen d Iazen aâaqeb sennig wen, ne$ seddaw ivaôen nnwen. Ne$ a kwen Issemfaôaq, kra segwen ad jeôôben leqheô n wiyav". Wali amek id Nemmal issekniyen, amar ad meêûen
Iskaddeb it ugdud ik, u neppa d tidep. Ini: "ur awen lli$ d awkil
Yal asali s lweqt is. A ppu$alem a ppeéôem
Ma twalav wid ipnamaren $ef issekniyen nne£, eoo iten, alamma bedlen anamer. Ma iseppu k Cciîan, mi d temmektiv, ur p$imi d ugdud imednas
Ur isefk ara i wid ipêezziben, a ten êasben deg wacemma. Maca d asmekti, amar ad êezzben

Eoo wid irran ddin nnsen d urar, d aqesseô. T$uôô iten tmeddurt n ddunit. Mmekti d yis, ard a ipwaîîef umdan $ef wayen ikseb. Ur isâi, war Öebbi, bab ne$ amcafaâ. Yal le$ôama ur tepwaqbal segs. Widak d wid ipwaîfen $ef wayen kesben. I nitni tissit iô$an, aâaqeb aqeôêan, ilmend n wayen la jehlen

Ini: "day a nâaô, war Öebbi, ayen ur a$ neneffaâ, ur a$ neîîuôôu? U a nu$al a nwexxeô, deffir nnhaya n Öebbi, am win $ewwan ccwaîen di tmurt, u ippuêeyyeô". Pnecciden t imeddukwal ar nnhaya: "yya $uône$"! Ini: "d nnhaya n Öebbi, s tidep, ay d nnhaya. Nepwameô a nanez i Mass imavalen
èéalet, êezzbet aS. £uôeS, Neppa, ara tepwafessrem
D Neppa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Ass ideg ara Yini: "ili"! Ad yili. Awal iS d tidep. IneS tagelda. Ass uûuvu n lbuq, Iéôa i iffren d wayen ivehôen. Neppa d Bab n ûûwab, i Iéôan
Mi inna Ibôahim i baba s, Azaô: "day a pperrev tiâancuôin d iôebbiten? Nek wala$ k, keçç akked ugdud ik, di ttelfan n ûûeê
Akka, Nessken i Ibôahim, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan, iwakken ad yili seg wid itebbten
Mi t i$umm yiv, iwala itri, inna: "wagi d Mass iw". Mi ixsi, inna: "ur êemle$ ara wid ixessin
Mi iwala iuli d waggur n tziri, inna: "wagi d Mass iw". Mi i$ab, inna: "ma ur iyi Inha ara Mass iw, ad ili$, war ccekk, seg ugdud im$eôôqen
Mi iwala iîij ineqqeô ed, inna: "wagi d Mass iw, wagi meqqweô kteô". Mi i$li, inna: "a yagdud iw! Nek rri$ akkin ayen tepcarakem
Nek zzi$ udem iw ar Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, male$ ar tidep. Ur lli$, nek, seg imcurak
Ixuûem it ugdud is, inna: "day ad iyi txaûmem $ef Öebbi? Ni$ Inha yi; ur ugade$ ayen i S tcurkem, siwa ma illa wayen i S ihwan i Mass iw. Tussna n Mass iw tezdi yal cci, day ur d tesmektayem ara
Amek ara ugade$ ayen tepcarakem, ur tugadem mi kunwi tepcarakem, i Öebbi, ayen iwumi ur d Issers adabu fellawen? Anwa, ger sin ikabaran, i iklalen laman, maday tessnem
Wid iumnen, ur sselsen ddens i liman nnsen, widak ad ilin di laman, u nitni pwanhan
D wagi ay d awal nne£. Nefka yas t i Ibôahim, mgal agdud is. Nessalay tiseddaôin, win i£ £ ihwan. Ih, Mass ik d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw
Nefka yas Isêaq akked Yaâqub. I sin, Nenha ten. Nenha, zik, Nuê akw, ger tarwa s, Dawed, Sliman, Yub, Yusef, Musa, Haôun, - Akka ay Nepkafi iâaôviyen
Zakarya, Yeêya, Âisa, Ilyas, - akw seg iâaôviyen
Ismaâil, Lyasâa, Yunes, Luî, - akw Nesmenyaf iten $ef imavalen
akw seg ibabaten nnsen, si tarwa nnsen, akked watmaten nnsen. Nefren iten, u Nebbwi ten d ubrid uwqim
Tagi d nnhaya n Öebbi. Inehhu yis win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Lemmer curken, war ccekk, ad asen imêu wayen xeddmen
D wigi iwumi d Nebbwi Tazmamt, ûûwab, akked lambiyya. Ma jehlen widak yis, ihi, Nekwni Nwekkel ip i ugdud ur njehhel yis
Wigi d wid Inha Öebbi. Ddu d nnhaya nnsen. Ini: "ur awen suture$, fellas, taqdiât. Neppa d asmekti kan i imavalen

Ur qudôen Öebbi azal n lqedô iS, mi qqaôen: "ur d Issers Öebbi acemma ar umdan". Ini: "anwa id Issersen Tazmamt, id ibbwi Musa, d tafat u d nnhaya i medden? Tepparam p di lkwa$ev i tesskanem. Aîas ay teppeffrem. Tlemdem ayen ur tessinem, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen". Ini: "D Öebbi". Sinna, anef asen ad uraren s nnmara nnsen
Tagi d Tazmamt, Nessers ip id teôqa, a ptebbet ayen ip id izwaren, a ppendeô tayimmap n temdinin akked wayen i s d izzin. Wid iumnen s laxeôt, umnen yis. Nitni bedden i téilla nnsen

Anwa idensen sennig win d igren tikerkas $ef Öebbi? Ne$ inna: "ppuweêêa$ d", ur as d ippuweêêa wacemma? U win innan: "a d sserse$ am wayen id Issers Öebbi"? Lemmer a pwaliv imednas, di maylellif n tmeppant, u lmalayek élent ed ifassen nnsent: "ssuff$et ed tiôwiêin nnwen. Assa, a ppeppuqeîîim s uâaqeb isneêcamen, ilmend n wayen teqqaôem $ef Öebbi, ur d tidep. U tellam tessem$waôem iman nnwen, $ef issekniyen iS

Ni$ tusam a£ d, d ifôiden, akken ikwen Nexleq abrid amezwaru. Teooam deffir wen, ayen i wen Nefka. Ur Nwala, $uôwen, imcafâen nnwen, wid i tâabdem, nitni, d icriken nnwen. Ni$ temfaôaqem, u ooan kwen wid la tâabdem
Öebbi, s tidep, Ifeôôec aâqqa, i$es. Issuffu$ ed amuddir si lmegget. Issuffu$ ed lmegget seg umuddir. Akka ay d Öebbi. Acimi tugim
Issenkar tafrara. Irra iv i ureyyeê, iîij d waggur i leêsab. D wagi ay d aseyyi n Uzmir, Amusnaw
D Neppa i wen Irran itran, ad awen mlen abrid, di tillas n lberr akked yill. Ni$ Nemmal issekniyen i ugdud issnen
D Neppa ikwen id Ixelqen si yiman afôid, sinna: amkan, tarusi. Ni$ Nemmal issekniyen i ugdud ifehhmen

D Neppa id Isrusun aman seg igenni. Nessuffu$ ed yissen yal im$an. Nessuffu$ ed yissen tizzegzewt. Nessuffu$ ed yissen iâaqqayen mbabben, iguza n ppmeô id ipûubbun si tezdayin, leonanat n tfeôôant, uzemmur, n ôemman, ppemcabin ne$ ur ppemcabin. Walit ppemôa nnsen mi d teffe$ tebbwa. Ih, deg waya, war ccekk, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Rran i Öebbi, leonun d icriken, u Ixelq iten. Snulfan aS d arrac, tullas, ur éôin. Gedha s yiS! Ay Aâlay sennig wayen d qqaôen
Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, amek ara Isâu mmi S, ur Isâi tameddakwelt? U Ixleq yal cci, u Neppa, yal cci, Issen it
D wagi ay d Öebbi, Mass nnwen, ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. Ixleq yal cci, ihi âabdet eP. Neppa d Awkil n yal cci
Ur T tepsami tmu$li. Neppa Ipsami tamu$li. Neppa d Laîif, i Izôan
Ni$ iusa kwen id ara twalim, s$uô Mass nnwen. Win iwalan, i iman is; win idre$len, mgal is. Ur lli$ nek d amêareb nnwen
Akka ay Nessefham issekniyen, iwakken ad inin: "tlemdev", iwakken a t Nbeggen i ugdud issnen
Ddu d wayen ik ed ippuweêêan, s$uô Mass ik; ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. Eoo imcurak
Lemmer i S ihwi i Öebbi, ur curken. Ur k Nerra d amêareb nnsen, ur telliv d awkil nnsen
Ur naâlet wid u$uô la pnujun, war Öebbi. Axaîeô ad naâlen Öebbi, s lbe$wv, war tamusni. Akka ay Ncebbeê igiten is i yal lois. Sinna, ar Mass nnsen, tu$alin nnsen; a ten Ixebbeô $ef wayen xeddmen
Ggulen s Öebbi, tagalit meqqwôen, ar ma iusa ten id ussekni, ar ad amnen yis. Ini: "issekniyen ar Öebbi kan". Acu i kwen irran têussem ar, xas ma iusa ten id, ur ppamnen
A Neppi ulawen nnsen, d yiéôi nnsen, akken ur uminen yis abrid amezwaru. A ten Neoo di lbe$wv nnsen, d ider$alen
Xas Nekwni Nessers asen d lmalayek, u mmeslayen asen d lmeggtin, u Nefser asen d, yal cci, zdat sen, ur ppamnen, siwa ma ihwa yaS i Öebbi. Maca, aîas degsen ur ssinen
Akka ay Nerra, i yal nnbi, acengu. Ccwaîen, seg imdanen akw si leonun, ppemweêêin garasen awal uziyn i u$uôôu. Lemmer i S ihwi, i Mass ik, ur p xeddmen. Ihi, eoo iten ar wayen d snulfuyen
iwakken ad mmalen $uôes ulawen n wid ur numin s laxeôt, a t ôavin, ad gemren ayen zerâen
Day b$i$ amêaddi, war Öebbi? D Neppa i wen d Issersen Tazmamt, s ussefhem. Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, éôan, ar neppat, ters ed s$uô Mass ik, s tidep. Ur ppili seg wid ipcukkun
Awal n Mass ik ibbwev, s tidep akked lmizan. Ur illi ubeddel deg wawal iS. Neppa Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma tu$ev awal i tegwti n wid illan di tmurt, a k telfen seg ubrid n Öebbi. Teddun kan d wayen nwan. Nitni snulfuyen d kan
Ih, Mass ik Issen sennig akw, anwi innetlafen seg ubrid iS. Neppa Issen sennig akw, anwi ipwanhan
Eççet ayen i$ef d immekti isem n Öebbi, ma tumnem s issekniyen iS

Acu ikwen iu$en, ur teppeppem ara seg wayen i$ef d immekti isem n Öebbi? Ni$ Issfehm awen ayen i wen Igdel, siwa ma ipwaêeppem fellawen. Ih, aîas ay tellifen, s zzhu nnsen, war tussna. Ni$ Mass ik Iugar akw akken Issen wid izegren tilas
Ekkset abekkav uvhiô akked uffir. Ih, wid ibbwin abekkav, ad ppuqeîîin $ef wayen xeddmen
Ur teppet ayen i$ef ur d immekti ara, isem n Öebbi. Ih, ayagi d ixmiô. Ih, ccwaîen pweêêin i imeddukwal nnsen, a kwen namren. Ma tu$em asen awal, kunwi, s tidep, tcurkem
Ma win illan d lmegget, Nessider it id, Nga yas tafat, iteddu yis ger medden, day d amedya s, win illan di tillas, ur izmir ad iffe$ segsent. Akka, ippucebbeê i ijehliyen, wayen xeddmen
Akka ay Nerra, ad ppandin di yal tamdint, ibe$wviyen is, uqsiêen mavi. Ppandin kan i iman nnsen, ur faqen

Ma iusa ten id ussekni, ad inin: "ur neppamen, alamma iusa ya$ d ayen id iusan ar imazanen n Öebbi". Öebbi Yif akw akken Issen, anida ara Ifk tabôap iS. Ad iôxisen, ar Öebbi, wid ibe$wven. Fellasen aâaqeb uqsiê, ilmend n wayen ppandin
Win Ib$a Öebbi a t Inhu, ad illi idmaren is ar wannuz. Win Ib$a a t Itlef, ad Irr idmaren is deyqen, têeyyôen, amzun ippaâôav ad iali s igenni. Akka i Ippara Öebbi axerwaâ i wid ur numin
Wagi d abrid uwqim n Mass ik. Ni$ Nessefham issekniyen i ugdud ismektayen
I nitni, axxam n tifrat ar Mass nnsen. Neppa d Bab nnsen, $ef wayen xeddmen

Ass ideg ara ten Ifser meôôa: "a yagraw n leonun, ni$ tcerrâem deg imdanen"? A d inin imawlan nnsen, seg imdanen: "a Mass nne$! Kra segne$ $elten si kra, Nebbwev ar lajel nne$, i $ Terriv". Inna: "d times ay d tanezdu$t nnwen, ad degs twekkôem, siwa ma ur aS ihwi i Öebbi". Ih, Mass ik d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw
Akka ay Neppara kra imednas d iêbiben n kra, ilmend n wayen keppben

A yagraw n leonun d yimdanen, day ur kwen id usan ara imazanen segwen? Mmalen awen issekniyen iW, nedôen kwen $ef temlilit n wass nnwen agi". Nnan d: "ncehhed $ef yiman nne$". T$uôô iten tmeddurt n ddunit. Cehhden $ef yiman nnsen ar nitni, s tidep, llan d ijehliyen
Akka, acku Mass ik ur Isquccu tamdint, s ddens, ma llan imezda$ is d i$wefliyen
I yal yiwen, tiseddarin seg wayen ixdem. Ur I$effel Mass ik $ef wayen xeddmen
Mass ik d Asâay, d Bab uêunu. Ma ihwa yaS a kwen Ikkes, a d Inûef, deffir wen, ayen i S ihwan, akken ikwen id Ixleq si tarwa n ugdud nniven
Ih, ayen i wen ippuâahden, a d ias, war ccekk. Ur tezmirem, kunwi, a ppesfunngem
Ini: "a yagdud iw! Xedmet akken tewâam, nek ad xedme$. Deqqal a ppeéôem iwumi ara telhu taggara n Uxxam". S tidep, ur rebêen imednas

Gan aS i Öebbi amur, seg wayen id Ifka n l$ella, akked lmal. Nnan: "wagi i Öebbi –- di tikta nnsen -, wagi i icriken nne$". Ayen gan i icriken nnsen, ur ippawev ar Öebbi. Ayen gan i Öebbi, neppa, ad yawev ar icriken nnsen. I icmet wayen id pêuddun
Akka ay cebbêen icriken nnsen, i waîas n yimcurak, timen$iwt n tarwa nnsen, iwakken a ten squccen, u ad irwi ddin nnsen, fellasen. Lemmer i S ihwi i Öebbi, ur p xeddmen. Eoo iten ar wayen d snulfuyen

Nnan: "lmal akked l$ella yagi ppugedlen, ur ten itepp, siwa win i $ ihwan". S tikta nnsen. Lmal iwumi gedlen iârar nnsen, lmal iwumi ur d ppadren fellasen, isem n Öebbi. D asnulfu mgal iS. A ten Iqeîîi $ef wayen d snulfuyen
Qqaôen: "ayen illan deg iâabbav n lmal agi, i ddker nne$ kan, ipwagdel i tlawin nne$". Ma ilul ed immut, ad mlilen $uôes. A ten Iqeîîi $ef wayen d qqaôen. Neppa, s tidep, d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw
Ni$ xesôen wid in$an arraw nnsen. D tiderwect, war tussna. Gedlen ayen i s iten I$at Öebbi, snulfan d mgal Öebbi. Ni$ nnetlafen, ur pwanhan

D Neppa id Ixelqen leonanat s iâricen, ne$ war iâricen, tizdayin, zerriâa n yal ûûenf, i wuççi; azemmur akked rreman ippemcabin, ne$ ur neppemcabi. Eççet si ppemôa nnsen, ma fkan d, efket leêqq is, ass u$ellet nnsen. Ur ssugutet. Neppa, s tidep, ur Iêemmel ara wid ipêawalen
Si lmal, aggway d wussu. Eççet seg wayen ikwen Iôéeq Öebbi. Ur teddut d iberdan n Cciîan. Neppa, s tidep, d acengu nnwen n ûûeê
Ïamt tyugiwin, snat u$welmi, snat umâiz. Ini: "d sin n ddker i Igdel, ne$ d snat n nnta, ne$ d ayen illan deg iâabbav n snat n nnta? Xebbôet iyi d, s tussna, ma tessawalem tidep

Seg ile$wman, snat, seg ubeqôi, snat. Ini: "d sin n ddker i Igdel, ne$ d snat n nnta, ne$ d ayen illan deg iâabbav n snat n nnta, ne$ tellam d inagan mi kwen id Iweûûa Öebbi $ef waya"? Anwa idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Öebbi, iwakken ad itlef imdanen, ur issin. Ih, Öebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas

Ini: "ur ufi$ ipwagdel a t içç yiwen, deg wayen iyi d ippuweêêan, siwa ma illa d loifa, ne$ d idim immaren, ne$ d aksum n yilef - wagi, war ccekk, d lewsex -, ne$ îêegga s d$wel i war Öebbi. Win i$ef ippuêeppem, ur ib$i, ur ib$wiv, Mass ik, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu

I wudayen, Negdel ayen akw isâan acaren, seg ubeqôi akked u$welmi, Negdel asen tassemt nnsen, siwa tin n iârar nnsen, iâabbav, akked wayen ipwaxelven akked i$san. Akka ay ten Nepkafi, ilmend n îîeôô nnsen. Nekwni, war ccekk, d At Tidep
Ma skaddben k, ini: "Mass nnwen d Bab uêunu iwsâan, ur ipwexxiô ssexv iS, af ugdud ibe$wviyen

Ad inin imcurak: "lemmer i S ihwi i Öebbi, nekwni akked imezwura nne$, ur ncurek, ur negdel acemma". Akka ay skaddben imezwura nnsen, armi jeôôben ssexv nne£. Ini: "day tesâam tussna ar a$ d tesseknem? Teppeddum kan d nnwaya, kunwi tesnulfuyem d kan
Ini: "n Öebbi timenna tunûiêin. Lemmer i S ihwi, yili Inha kwen akw

Ini: "awit ed inagan nnwen, ara icehhden ar Öebbi Igdel ayagi". Ma cehhden, ur cehhed yidsen. Ur teddu d lhawiyya n wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, akked wid ur numin s laxeôt, u pparan tanudda i Mass nnsen

Ini: "yyaw, ad ini$. I wen Igdel Mass nnwen: ur aS tepcarakem acemma; elhut ar imawlan nnwen; ur neqqet tarwa nnwen, di tigullelt - d Nekwni ara kwen Iôeéqen yidsen -, ur ppaéet ar lâaô, d uvhiô ne$ d uffir; ur neqqet amdan, d ayen Igdel Öebbi, siwa ma s lêeqq". Ar waya i kwen Iweûûa, amar a pfehmem

Ur pqeôôibet s ayla ugujil, siwa s wayen ilhan, alamma immeêtel. Weznet, ktilet s lewqama. Ur Nepkellif amdan siwa ar wayen iwumi izmer. Ma thedôem d, weznet, xas ma $eô llzem nnwen. Qadôet lemâahda n Öebbi. Iweûûa kwen $ef waya, amar a d temmektim
D wagi ay d abrid iW uwqim, ddut degs. Ur teddut d iberdan ara kwen isîixôen seg ubrid iS. Iweûûa kwen $ef waya, amar a pêezzbem
Sinna, Nefka Tazmamt i Musa. Tewqem i wid imaânen, tfeûûel yal cci, d nnhaya u d aêunu. Amar ad amnen s timlilit n Mass nnsen
Tagi d Tazmamt, Nessers ip id, teôqa. Ihi, ddut yides, êezzbet, amar fellawen aêunu
Ur d teqqaôem ara: "ters ed kan Tezmamt $eô sin leoyus, uqbel nne$, ur neéôi d acu sselmaden

Ne$ a d tinim: "lemmer id ters Tazmamt $uône$, yili nif iten akken nepwanha". Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen, s$uô Mass nnwen, d nnhaya u d aêunu. Anwa idensen sennig win iskaddben issekniyen n Öebbi, u iooa iten? A Nqeîîi wid iooan issekniyen nne£, s yir aâaqeb, ilmend n wayen la ppaooan

D acu pôaoun, siwa ma ten id asent lmalayek, ne$ a d Ias Mass ik, ne$ a d asen kra issekniyen n Mass ik? Ass ideg ara d asen kra issekniyen n Mass ik, ur infaâ umdan liman is, ma, iu$ lêal, ur iumin ara, ne$ ur iksib lxiô, di liman is. Ini: "gganit, nekwni, ih, la nepgani
Ih, wid ibvan ddin nnsen, u gan ikabaren, ur tepkkiv yidsen deg wacemma. Lameô nnsen ar Öebbi kan, sinna, a ten Ixebbeô $ef wayen xeddmen
Win id iusan s yise$, ines mraw i t icban; win id iusan s tucmip, ad ippuqeîîi s tin kan i p icban; nitni ur pwadensen
Ini: "nek, Inha iyi Mass iw, ar ubrid uwqim, d ddin n ddwam, win n Ibôahim, i imalen ar tidep, ur nelli seg imcurak
Ini: "ih, taéallit iw, iseflan iw, tudert iw, tameppant iw, i Öebbi, Mass imavalen
Ur aS illi ucarek. Pwamôe$ d s waya: nek d amduâ amenzu

Ini: "day b$i$ mass, war Öebbi? U Neppa d Mass n yal cci". Ur ikesseb yal yiman, siwa mgal is. Ur ipbibbi win ibubben taâkkwemt n wayev. Sinna, ar Mass nnwen, tu$alin nnwen. Sinna, a kwen Ixebbeô $ef wayen tellam temgaradem
D Neppa i kwen Irran d igensas di tmurt. Irra, kra segwen, tiseddaôin sennig wiyav, iwakken a kwen Ijeôôeb $ef wayen i wen Ifka. Ih, Mass ik Ip$awal deg uâaqeb. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Almû
Tazmamt ters ed $uôek, ur teppili segs lhejna deg idmaren ik, iwakken a pnabiv yis; u d asmekti i lmumnin
Ddut d wayen id irsen $uôwen, s$uô Mass nnwen. Ur teddut d imawlan, war Neppa. Drus id tesmektayem
Acêal n temdinin ay Nessenger. Tusa ten id tiyta nne£, deg ives nnsen, ne$ deg uqeggel nnsen
Ti$ôi nnsen, mi ten id tusa tiyta nne£, siwa mi d nnan: "ih, nella d imednas
War ccekk, a Nesteqsi wid u$uô id Nuzen, a Nesteqsi imazanen
War ccekk, ad asen Neêku, s tmusni, ur Nelli N$ab
Awzan, assen, d tidep. Wid iwumi ééayet lweznat nnsen, widak d wid irebêen
Wid iwumi fessuset lweznat nnsen, widak d wid ixesôen iman nnsen, seg akken sednasen issekniyen nne£
Ni$, s tidep, Nesrekd ikwen di tmurt, Nerra yawen, degs, tamâict nnwen. Drus ay tesnemmirem
Ni$, s tidep, Nxelq ikwen, sinna, Nmesl ikwen, sinna, Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem"! Knant, siwa Iblis. Ur illi seg wid iknan
Inna: "acu k iîîfen ur tekniv ara, mi k d Umôe$"? Inna d: "Nek, ife$ t. Txelqev iyi si tmes, Txelqev t si talaxt
Inna: "ihi, ûûub segs! Ur ak ippunefk ara a ppesme$wôev iman ik, degs. Effe$, keçç seg wid ixuûen
Inna: "Eoo iyi, ar ass ideg ara d kkren
Inna: "keçç, ih, seg wid ara iqqimen
Inna d: "imi iyi Tâammdev a$ewwu, ad asen qqime$, war ccekk, deg ubrid iK uwqim
Sinna, ad asen d tekke$ zdat, deffir, yeffus, zelmev. Ur Teppafev, $eô tugwti segsen, asnemmer
Inna: "effe$ segs, d ameêquô ippuvegôen! War ccekk, ad Acaôe$ Loahennama s wid, segsen, i k ivefôen, akked yiswen akw
A Adem, ezde$ Loennet, keçç akked tmeîîut ik, eççet seg wayen i wen ihwan. Ur pqeôôibet ttejôa agi, mulac a ppilim seg imednas
I$ewwa ten Cciîan, iwakken ad asen d iban âaryan nnsen i illan iffer. Inna: "Ikkes awen, kan, Mass nnwen, ttejôa agi, iwakken ur teppilim d lmalayek, ne$ ur tepwekkiôem
Iggul asen: "nek, i kunwi, d unûiê

Isdull iten s u$uôôu. Mi âaôven si ttejôa nni, walan iman nnsen aâran. Lhan d la pcuddun, $ef iman nnsen, afriwen n Loennet. Issawel asen d Mass nnsen: "day ur awen Gdile$ ara ttejôa nni? Ad awen Ini$: war ccekk, Cciîan, i kunwi, d acengu n ûûeê
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Nvuôô iman nne$. Ma ur a$ Tsemmêev, ur Têunev fella$, a nili seg imexsuôen
Inna: "erset! Kra d icenga n kra. A pzed$em di tmurt, a ppezhum, tallit kan
Irna: "degs a ppidirem, degs a ppemmtem, segs a d teff$em
A tarwa n Adem! Ni$ Nessers awen ed aceîîiv ara kwen issôen, ôôêuê, akked uceîîiv uêezzeb. Wagi yif iten". Ayagi seg issekniyen n Öebbi, amar a d mmektin

A tarwa n Adem! £uôwat a kwen ihewwel Cciîan, akken id issuffe$ imezwura nnwen si Loennet! Ikkes asen iceîîiven nnsen, iwakken ad asen issken âaryan nnsen. Neppa, war ccekk, ipwali kwen - neppa akked ccetla s - seg wanda ur ten tepwalim. Ni$ Nerra ccwaîen d imawlan n wid ur numin
Mi xedmen ayen n dir, ad inin: "nufa d akka ar imezwura nne$, u Öebbi Iumeô a$ d $uôes. Ini: "Öebbi, s tidep, ur Ippameô ar wayen n dir. Day a d tinim $ef Öebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Ini: "Iumeô ed Öebbi lmizan. Zzit $uôeS udmawen nnwen di yal lekni, nujet $uôeS. £uôeS, s ddin iûfan. Akken ikwen id Ixleq, a ppu$alem
Arbaâ Inha it, arbaâ iura ttelfan fellas. Nitni, s tidep, rran ccwaîen d iêbiben, war Öebbi. U $ilen nitni, war ccekk, pwanhan
A tarwa n Adem! Ccebêet i yal lekni, eççet, esswet, ur sîuqqutet. Neppa, s tidep, ur Iêemmel ara wid isîuqquten

Ini: "anwa i igedlen ccbaêa n Öebbi, id Issuffe$ i imdanen iS, akked ôôeéq ilhan"? Ini: "ayagi, di tmeddurt n ddunit, i wid iumnen. I nitni kan ass n tnekra". Akka ay Nfeûûel issekniyen i ugdud issnen
Ini: "Mass iw Igdel kan ayen n dir, d uvhiô ne$ d uffir, abekkav, tem$weô war ssebba, a pcarkem i Öebbi ayen iwumi ur d irs udabu, a ppinim $ef Öebbi ayen ur tessinem
Yal lois isâa lajel. Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ur t swexxiôen s ssaâa, ur t id ééaéan
A tarwa n Adem! Ma usan kwen id imazanen segwen, mmalen awen issekniyen iW, wid ipêezziben, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, u sme$wôen iman nnsen fellasen, widak d at tmes, nitni degs ad wekkôen

Anwa idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Öebbi, ne$ iskaddben issekniyen iS? Widak, a ten iêaz umur i sen iuran di Tezmamt. Alamma, mi ten id usan imceggâen nne£, ad ddmen leôwaê nnsen, ad inin: "anida ten wid u$uô tepnujum, war Öebbi"? A d inin: "ur ten nufi". Ad cehhden, $ef yiman nnsen, ar nitni llan d ijehliyen

Inna: "kecmet di tmes ar leoyus n leonun akked yimdanen, i kwen id izwaren"! Yal tikelt ara ikcem lois, ad ixzu gma s. Alamma, mi mlalen degs akw, ad yini uneggaru nnsen $ef umezwaru nnsen: "a Mass nne$! Wigi telfen a$, Aâqeb iten s tmes, berdayen". Inna: "i yal yiwen berdayen, maca ur teéôim ara
Inna umezwaru nnsen i uneggaru nnsen: "ur kwen smenyafen i nekwni, ihi jeôôbet aâaqeb, ilmend n wayen tkeppbem
Ih, wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, u sme$wôen iman nnsen fellasen, ur asen tellin tibbura igenni, ur keçmen Loennet, skud ur iâadda ara ul$em di tiî n tsegnit. Akka ay Nepqeîîi ibe$wviyen
I nitni ameîôeê di Loahennama, ad $ummen s tmes. Akka ay Nepqeîîi imednas
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan - ur Nepkellif i umdan siwa ayen iwumi izmer - widak, d at Loennet, nitni, degs, ad wekkôen

A Nekkes i d igwran n dd$el, deg idmaren nnsen. Isaffen ad ppazzalen ddawat sen. Ad inin: "ccekôan i Öebbi i $ Inhan $eô waya. Ur nepwanhu, lemmer ur a$ Inha ara Öebbi. Ni$ usan d imazanen n Mass nne$, s tidep". Ad pwanecden: "appan Loennet, tweôtem p, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
At Loennet ad siwlen i at tmes: "ni$ nufa i $ Iâahed Mass nne$, s tidep. Ma tufam ayen i wen Iâahed Mass nnwen, s tidep"? A inin: "Ih". Iberreê uberraê garasen: "xezzu n Öebbi i imednas
wid iîîeôôifen seg ubrid n Öebbi, ssaramen t d uâwij, u nekôen laxeôt
Garasen ssteô. £ef iqacucen, irgazen, ssnen ten akw, ar ûûiffat nnsen. Ad siwlen i at Loennet: "tifrat fellawen"! Ur p keççmen, xas ssarmen
Mi zzint wallen nnsen ar at tmes, ad inin: "a Mass nne$! Ur a$ Ppara s agdud imednas
Ad siwlen at iqacucen i irgazen, ssnen ten ar ûûiffat nnsen. Ad inin: "acu i wen d issuli wayen tjemâam akked wayen tzuxxem
Day wigi d wid i$ef teggulem, ar ur sen ippak Öebbi aêunu? "Kecmet Loennet, ur teppagwadem, ur t$weblem
At tmes ad siwlen i at Loennet: "smiret ed fellane$ aman, ne$ seg wayen is ikwen I$at Öebbi". Ad inin: "Öebbi, s tidep, Igdel iten i ijehliyen
wid irran ddin nnsen d zzhu, d urar, u t$uôô iten tmeddurt n ddunit". Ihi, assa, a ten Neppu, akken ppun timlilit n wass nnsen agi, u nekôen issekniyen nne£
Ni$ Nusa ten id s Tezmamt, Nfeûûel ip s tussna. D nnhaya, d aêunu i ugdud iumnen

Day la pôaoun kan veôôu s? Ass n tisin n veôôu s, ad inin wid illan, iu$ lêal, ppun p: "ni$ usan d imazanen n Mass nne$, s tidep. Day nesâa imcafâen ara $ icafâen, ne$ ad a$ rren, a nexdem ayen mgirrden wayen nxeddem"? Ni$ sxeûôen iman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen

S tidep, Mass nnwen d Öebbi. Ixelq ed tamurt akked igenwan di sdis wussan, sinna, Iâannec $ef usgeld. Ip$ummu iv s wass, ip$awalen $uôes. Iîij, aggur, akked yitran unzen i lameô iS. Day maççi ineS lxelq akked lameô? D Asaâdi Öebbi, Mass imavalen
Naâret Mass nnwen, s wannuz, di tbavnit. Neppa, s tidep, ur Iêemmel ara wid izegren tilas
Ur ssefsadet di tmurt deffir useêôet is. Naâôet eP, s tugwdi d usirem. Aêunu n Öebbi, s tidep, ar tama n lâuûam

D Neppa id Ippaznen avu, d abecceô s uêunu S. Alamma, ma ibbub ed asigna aéayan, Nenheô it ar tmurt immuten. Nesse$li d syis aman. Nessuffe$ ed yissen yal ppemôa. Akka ay d Nessuffu$ lmeggtin, amendeô ma d tesmektim
Di tmurt lâali, teff$en d im$an is, ma Irad Öebbi. Di tin icemten, teff$en d kan d iweqweqen. Akka ay Nepbeggin issekniyen i ugdud isnemmiren
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nuê i ugdud is. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Âabdet Öebbi! Ur tesâim ôebbi war Neppa. Nek ugade$ fellawen aâaqeb, ass ameqwôaêan
Nnan imvebbôen n ugdud is: "$uône$, s tidep, aql ak di ttelfan n ûûeê
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ur illi dgi ttelfan. Maca nek d amazan s$uô Mass imavalen
Bbwi$ awen d tibratin n Mass iw, a kwen neûêe$. Ssne$, s$uô Öebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Day twehmem mi kwen id iusa usmekti s$uô Mass nnwen, ibbwi t id urgaz segwen, iwakken a kwen inabi, iwakken a pêezzbem, amar fellawen aêunu
Skaddben t. Nsellek it, akked wid illan yides, di lbabuô. Ne$meq wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Nitni, s tidep, d agdud ader$al
Ar Âad, gmat sen Hud. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Âabdet Öebbi! Ur tesâim ôebbi, war Neppa. Day ur tepêezziben ara
Nnan imvebbôen, wid ijehlen seg ugdud is: "s tidep, $uône$, deg k tisselbi; $uône$, ih, keçç seg wid iskiddiben
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ur dgi tisselbi. Maca nek d amazan s$uô Mass imavalen
Bbwi$ awen d tibratin n Mass iw. Nek, i kunwi, d aneûûaê muman

Day twehmem mi kwen id iusa usmekti s$uô Mass nnwen, ibbwi t id urgaz segwen, iwakken a kwen inabi. Mmektit ed mi kwen Irra d igensas, deffir ugdud n Nuê. Isem$weô aîas lqedd nnwen. Mmektit ed lxiô n Öebbi, amar a prebêem
Nnan: "day a$ d tusiv, iwakken a naâbed Öebbi Yiwen, a neoo ayen llan âabden imezwura nne$? Awi ya$ d ayen is la $ tessagwadev, ma d tidep ay tessawalev

Inna: "ni$ iwwet ikwen id ddell akked zzâaf s$uô Mass nnwen. Day ad iyi namren $ef ismawen i tefkam, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen, i wid iwumi ur d Issers Öebbi kra udabu. Ihi, gganit, nek yidwen seg wid ara igganin
Nsellek it, akked wid illan yides, s uêunu s$uône£. Nessenger wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, ur nelli d lmumnin

£uô Tamud, gmat sen Üaliê. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Âabdet Öebbi! Ur tesâim ôebbi war Neppa. Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen s$uô Mass nnwen. Tal$wemt agi n Öebbi, d assekni i kunwi. Ooet ep a ppeçç di tmurt n Öebbi. Ur p îîuôôut, mulac a kwen iêaz uâaqeb aqeôêan
Mmektit ed mi kwen Irra d igensas, deffir Âad. Isseqâad ikwen di tmurt, tepparram lebôuj di swaêel, teqqazem ixxamen deg durar. Ihi, mmektit ed lxiô n Öebbi, ur ssexsaôet tamurt, s usefsed
Imvebbôen seg ugdud is, wid isme$awôen iman nnsen, nnan i wuôhifen, wid segsen iumnen: "day teéôam ar ÛüÜaliê d amazan s$uô Mass is"? Nnan: "ih, numen s wayen is id ippuceggaâ
Nnan imzuxiyen: "nekwni, s tidep, nenkeô ayen is tumnem
Ëerrfen avaô n tel$wemt, gelzen lameô n Mass nnsen. Nnan: "a Üaliê, awi ya$ d ayen is la $ tessagwadev, ma d amazan ay telliv
Tewwet iten zzenzla, gwran d, deg ixxamen nnsen, d loeppat
Iwexxeô asen, u inna: "a yagdud iw! Ni$ ssawve$ awen d tabôap n Mass iw, neûêe$ kwen, maca ur têemmlem ara win ineûêen
I Luî, mi inna i ugdud is: "day a txeddmem lâaô ur ixdim yiwen, uqbel nnwen, deg imavalen
Ih, kunwi tpeddum ar irgazen, tcehwam ten, war tilawin. Kunwi, ih, d agdud izegren tilas
Tiririt n ugdud is siwa nnan: "ssuff$et pen si temdint nnwen, nitni d imdanen issaramen tezdeg
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameîîut is, teqqim akked wid igwran
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur…Wali amek tevôa d ibe$wviyen

£uô Madian, gmat sen Cuâayeb. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Âabdet Öebbi! Ur tesâim ôebbi war Neppa. Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen s$uô Mass nnwen. Ktilet, weznet, s lewqama. Ur îîuôôut medden di cci nnsen, ur ssefsadet di tmurt, deffir useêôet is. I kunwi yif it wayagi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ur p$imit di yal abrid, tessagwadem u tessefôa$em seg ubrid n Öebbi, wid iumnen yiS. Teb$am t d uâwij. Mmektit ed mi tellam d takwemmict, Iketteô ikwen. Walit amek tevôa taggara ifessaden
Ma illa iumen urbaâ segwen s wayen is id ppuceggâa$, arbaâ nniven ur iumin ara. Üebôet ard Iêudd Öebbi garane$. Neppa Yif akw imêaddan
Nnan d imvebbôen imzuxiyen, n ugdud is,: "a k nessuffe$ a Cuâayeb, keçç, akked wid iumnen yidek, si temdint nne$, ne$ a d tu$alev ar ddin nne$". Inna: "xas nugi

Ihi, nger ed tikerkas $ef Öebbi, ma nu$al ar ddin nnwen, mbaâd ma Isellek a$ Öebbi, segs. Ur a$ ilaq ara a nu$al $uôes, siwa ma Irad Öebbi, Mass nne$. Mass nne$ Issemêalleq i yal cci s tmusni. Nepkel $ef Öebbi". A Mass nne$! Fru p garane$ akked ugdud nne$, s tidep. Keçç Tifev akw wid iferrun
Nnan imvebbôen, wid ijehlen, n ugdud is: "ma teddam d Cuâayeb, war ccekk a pxesôem
Tewwet iten zzenzla, gwran d, deg ixxamen nnsen, d loeppat
Wid iskaddben Cuâayeb, u$alen amzun ur zdi$en. Wid iskaddben Cuâayeb, d nitni ay d imexûuôen
Iwexxeô asen, u inna: "a yagdud iw! Ni$ ssawve$ awen d tibôatin n Mass iw, neûêe$ kwen. Amek ara $weble$ $ef ugdud ijehliyen
Ur Nuzen ara nnbi ar temdint, mebla ma Newwet imezda$ is s cedda, akked lemveôôa, amar ad êiwten
Sinna, Nerra ise$ deg umkan n tucmip, armi wexxôen, nnan: "ni$ jeôôben imezwura nne$ lemveôôa akked ttrika". Newwet iten deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Lemmer kan uminen u êezzben imezda$ n temdinin, war ccekk, ad asen Nelli lbaôakat seg igenni akked tmurt. Maca, skaddben. Nessemêalleq asen, ilmend n wayen keppben
Day $ilen imezda$ n temdinin, ur ten id teppawev tiyta nne£, deg yiv, nitni îîsen
Ne$ day $ilen imezda$ n temdinin, ur ten id teppawev tiyta nne£, deg wazal, nitni ppuraren
Day $ilen sellken i tandit n Öebbi? Siwa agdud i ixesôen, i i$ilen sellken i tandit n Öebbi
Ne$ day ur d Iban ara, i wid ara iweôten tamurt, deffir imezda$ is, ar, ma ihwa ya£, a ten Newwet $ef ibekkaven nnsen, a Nesle$ ulawen nnsen, d$a nitni ur sellen
D timdinin agi, i$ef ak Nêekku, si teqûivin nnsent. Ni$ usan $uôsent imazanen nnsent, s ubeggen. Ur llint d tid ara iamnen deg wayen skaddbent uqbel. Akka i Iselle$ Öebbi ulawen ijehliyen
Ur Nufi nnesba ar tegwti nnsen. Nufa, tegwti nnsen, d iballa$en
Sinna, deffir sen, Nuzen ed Musa, s issekniyen nne£, ar Ferâun akked imvebbôen is. Densen ten. Wali amek tevôa d ifessaden
Inna Musa: "a Ferâun! Nek d amazan s$uô Mass imavalen
D ûûeê, ur qqaôe$, $ef Öebbi, siwa tidep. Ih, usi$ kwen id, s ubeggen n Mass nnwen. Ihi, azen yidi At Isôail
Inna: "ma tusiv d s ussekni, zzi t id, ma tessawalav tidep
Iveggeô taâkwazt is, appan d azrem n ûûeê
Issuffe$ ed afus is, iban ed d amellal i imnezhen
Nnan d imvebbôen n ugdud n Ferâun: "wagi, s tidep, d aseêêar amusnaw
Ib$a a kwen issuffe$ si tmurt nnwen, d acu t lameô nnwen
Nnan: "anef as, neppa akked gma s. Azen iberraêen ar temdinin
ad ak d awin yal aseêêar amusnaw
Usan d iseêêaren n Ferâun, nnan: "s tidep, ad a$ tkafiv, ma d nekwni ara i$elben
Inna: "ih, u, s tidep, a ppilim d iqôiben
Nnan: "a Musa! A pveggôev keçç, ne$ a nveggeô nekwni
Inna: "veggôet"! Mi veggôen, sdehcen allen n l$aci, ssagwden ten. Bbwin d ssêur anect ilat
Nweêêa i Musa: "veggeô taâkwazt ik"! Apan tesseblaâ ayen d ûenâan
Tûaô tidep, inqev wayen xeddmen
Akka ay pwa$elben. U$alen ar deffir, d unqisen
£lin iseêêaren, knan
Nnan: "numen s Mass imavalen
Mass n Musa akked Haôun
Inna Ferâun: "day tumnem yis, uqbel ma âammde$ awen? Ayagi, war ccekk, d tifxep. Tundim p di temdint, iwakken a ppessuff$em, segs, imezda$ is. Ihi, deqqal a ppeéôem
War ccekk, ad awen gezme$ afus ssya, avaô ssya. Sinna, ih, a kwen semmôe$ akw $ef imudag
Nnan: "nekwni a nu$al ar Mass nne
Terriv d ppaô segne$, imi kan numen s issekniyen n Mass nne$, mi $ d usan. A Mass nne$! Azen a$ d ûûbeô, Ddem leôwaê nne$ d imvuâen

Imvebbôen n ugdud n Ferâun, nnan: "day a ppeooev Musa akked ugdud is, ad ssefsaden di tmurt, a kwen ooen, keçç akked iôebbiten ik"? Inna: "a nene$ arrac nnsen, a nessider tilawin nnsen. Nekwni, sennig sen, d iqehhaôen
Inna Musa i ugdud is: "ppret afus n Öebbi, u ûebôet. Tamurt, war ccekk, n Öebbi. A p iwôet win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Taggara i wid ipêezziben
Nnan: "njaf uqbel a $ d tasev, u deffir tisin ik". Inna: "amar Mass nnwen ad Ine$ acengu nnwen, a kwen Irr d igensas di tmurt, ad Iwali amek ara txedmem
Newwet, d$a, lois n Ferâun s iseggwasen n llaé, akked nneqs n ppemôa, amar a d mmektin
Ma iusa ten id ise$, ad inin: "nne$ wagi". Ma tusa ten id tucmip, a p sbibben i Musa akked wid illan yides. Ayen iveôôun yidsen, day maççi ar Öebbi kan? Maca, tegwti segsen ur ssinen
Nnan: " wicqa assekni ara d tawiv, ur a$ tepseêêirev yis. Nekwni, ur neppamen yisek
Nuzen asen aêemmal, ajôad, tilkin, imqweôqwôen, idammen, d issekniyen ifeûlen. Sme$wôen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi tevôa yidsen twa$it, qqaôen: "a Musa! Nâaô Mass ik i nekwni, s wayen i k Iâahed. Ma tekksev a$ tawa$it, a namen yisek, a nazen yidek At Isôail
Mi sen Nekkes tawa$it, ar lajel iten iggunin, atnan nitni xedâan
Nerra d segsen ppaô, N$emq iten deg ill, imi skaddben issekniyen nne£, ur d celâen degsen
Nessewôet i ugdud i illan qehôen t, igmav akked ituram n tmurt, i Neôqa. Itam wawal ûûam n Mass ik, $ef At Isôail, ilmend n wayen ûebôen. Nhudd ayen iûennaâ Ferâun akked ugdud is, u wayen bennun
Nesâadda ill i At Isôail. Mmugren d agdud i iâabden tiâancuôin is. Nnan: "a Musa! Err ane$ ôebbi am iôebbiten nnsen". Inna: "kunwi, s tidep, d agdud ur nessin
Wigi, s tidep, ad inger wayen ideg llan, ad inqev wayen xeddmen
Inna: "day awen budde$ ôebbi, war Öebbi, u Neppa Ismenyaf ikwen $ef imavalen
Mi kwen Nsellek si lois n Ferâun, sukken fellawen aâaqeb uqsiê mavi; neqqen arrac nnwen, ssidiren tilawin nnwen. Deg waya, ajeôôeb s$uô Mass nnwen ameqwôaêan
Nemlal akked Musa kravet wavan, Nerna yasen mraw. Tebbwev tallit n Mass is, kuzet wavan. Inna Musa i gma s Haôun: "enûef iyi ar ugdud iw, exdem ayen ilhan, ur teddu d ubrid ifessaden

Mi d iusa Musa ar temlilit nne£, u Immeslay as Mass is, inna: "a Mass iw! Ssenâat iyi d, a K wali$". Inna d: "ur iyI tepwaliv, d awez$i, maca muqel s adrar. Ma iqqim deg umekkan is, ad iyI twaliv". Mi d Iusa Mass is s adrar, Irra t d saêel. I$li Musa, ixsef. Mi d iuki, inna: "gedha s yiseK! Utube$ K, nek d amezwaru n lmumnin
Inna: "a Musa! Aql I Smenyafe$ k $ef imdanen, i tebôatin iW, i wawal iW. Ddem ayen i k d Fki$, ili seg wid isnemmiren
Nura yas, di tlewêin, si yal cci, anabi akked ufeûûel n yal cci. Ddem itent s tezmert, ameô i ugdud ik a tent iîîef s lmaâna nnsent. Ad awen Ssekne$ tanezdu$t iballa$en

Ad Veôôfe$, seg issekniyen iW, wid isme$wôen iman nnsen di tmurt, war ssebba. Mi walan yal assekni, ur ppamnen yis. Ma walan abrid uûwib, ur teddun degs. Ma walan abrid n le$wlav, a t awin. Ayagi, acku, s tidep, skaddben issekniyen nne£, ur d celâen degsen
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, akked temlilit n laxeôt, ur swin igiten nnsen. Day a ten kafin $ef wayen ur nelli d ayen xeddmen
Agdud n Musa, deffir es, isbedd, s ôôêuê is, aâjmi bu loeppa isrugmuten. Day ur walan ara ar, s tidep, ur asen d ipmeslay, ur la ten inehhu s abrid? Âabden t, llan d imednas
Mi ppuêeccmen, u walan ar, zi$ nnetlafen, nnan: "ma ur Iêun ara fella$ Mass nne$, ma ur a$ Isemmeê ara, war ccekk, a nu$al seg imexsuôen

Mi d iu$al Musa ar ugdud is, s wurrif akked lêemûa, inna: "ay d ucmit wayen is iyi tneûfem, deffir iw! Teb$am a d i$iwwel lameô n Mass nnwen"? Iveggeô tilewêin, iîîef gma s seg uqeôôu, ijebt it id $uôes. Inna d: "a mmi s n yimma, s tidep, iêqeô iyi ugdud, qôib iyi n$an. Ur ssefôaê icenga yissi. Ur iyi pparra seg ugdud imednas
Inna: "a Mass iw! Semmeê ane$, nek akked gma, Ssekcem a$ ar uêunu K. Keçç, Tifev akw wid ipêunun
Ih, wid iâabden aâajmi, a d i$li fellasen wurrif n Mass nnsen, ad ndellen di tmeddurt n ddunit. Akka ay Nepqeîîi wid id isnulfuyen
Wid ixedmen tucmitin, sinna, steôoâen deffir sent, u umnen, Mass ik, s tidep, deffir sent, ar Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Mi irs wurrif is, iddem ed Musa tilewêin. Di tira nnsent, nnhaya akked uêunu i wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen

Ifren ed Musa ûatet irgazen seg ugdud is, ad mlilen yidne£. Mi ten tewwet zzenzla, inna: "a Mass iw! Lemmer i K ihwi, yili, iu$ lêal, Ten$iv ten, u Tegliv yissi. Day ad a$ Temêuv, ilmend n wayen xedmen ije$lufen segne$? Wagi d ahewwel iK kan, Tettellifev syis win i K ihwan, Tnehhuv win i K ihwan. Keçç d Bab nne$, Semmeê a$, Ëun fella$, Keçç Tifev akw wid ipsemmiêen

Aru ya$ ise$ di ddunit, di laxeôt; aql a$ nu$al ed $uôeK". Inna d: "aâaqeb iW, a t Sâaddi$ $ef win iyI ihwan. Aêunu W ijemmel yal cci. A t Aru$ i wid ipêezziben, ipzekkin, akked wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£

wid iteddun d Umazan, Nnbi ur ne$ôi, i ufan iura $uôsen di Tuôa akked Linoil". Iumeô asen d lqanun, Itekkes asen ayen n dir. Iêell asen lâali, igdel asen dduni. Ikkes asen aruz akked lqid nnsen. Ihi, wid iumnen yis, i t iâawnen, i t isellken, iddan d tafat id irsen yides, widak d imerbaê

Ini: "a yimdanen! Nek d Amazan n Öebbi $uôwen meôôa. Neppa, ineS tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. Issidir, Ineqq". Ihi, amnet s Öebbi akked Umazan iS, Nnbi ur ne$ôi, i iumnen s Öebbi akked wawal iS. Ddut yides, amar a ppepwanhum
Deg ugdud n Musa, arbaâ iteddu s tidep. U syis ay pêuddun

Nessemfaôaq iten $ef mrawsin laâôac, n leoyus. Mi s issuter ugdud is tissit, Nweêêa i Musa: ewwet aéôu s tâakwaz ik. F$ent ed segs mrawsnat tliwa; akka, yal amdan iéôa anda ara issew. Nesbur iten s usigna, Nessers asen d lmenna akked ifeôôuoen: "eççet seg wayen ilhan, is ikwen N$at". Ur a£ dnisen, maca la ddennisen iman nnsen
Mi pwanecden: "zed$et di temdint agi, eççet segs, ayen i wen ihwan, init: "laâfu"! Âaddit di tebburt, s lekni. Ad awen Nsemmeê tuccva nnwen. A Nernu i lâuûam
Wid idensen segsen, neûfen awalen s wid ur nelli d wid i sen nnan. Nuzen asen tiyta seg igenni, ilmend n wayen ddennisen
Steqsi ten $ef temdint i illan $ef rrif n yill, mi ur d rzin di ssebt, mi ten id usan iselman nnsen, walan ten, ass n ssebt. Ass, war ssebt, ur ten id ppasen. Akka ay ten Njeôôeb, deg wayen ssexsaôen
Mi d inna lois, segsen: "iwumi la tepnabim agdud ara Isqucc Öebbi, ne$ ara Iâaqeb s leqseê"? Nnan: "d aste$feô ar Mass nnwen, amar ad êezzben
Mi ppun ayen i$ef pwafekkôen, Nsellek wid itekksen ayen n dir, Nesâadda aâaqeb adiran $ef imednas, ilmend n wayen ssexsaôen
Mi sme$wôen iman nnsen $ef wayen i sen ipwakksen, Nenna yasen: "ilit d uddawen ucmiten
Mi Ixebbeô Mass ik, ard asen d Iazen ara ten iâaqben, s ééuô, alamma d ass n tnekra. Mass ik, s tidep, Ip$awal ar uâaqeb. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Nessemfaôaq iten di tmurt, d leoyus, garasen wid imaânen, garasen wid ur nemâin. Njeôôeb iten s ise$iyen akked tucmitin, amar a d u$alen s abrid

Neûfen ten, deffir sen, ineûûafen i iweôten Tazmamt. Ppaddamen lerbaê n ddunit, qqaôen: "ad a$ semmêen". Ma rnan usan ten id lerbaê, am widen, a ten ddmen. Day ur âahden ara s Tezmamt, ard tidep kan, ara inin $ef Öebbi? U lemden i illan degs. Ppif axxam aneggaru, i wid ipêezziben. Day ur tfehmem ara
Wid iîîfen di Tezmamt, ipéallan, s tidep, ur Nveggiâ arraz n lâuûam
Mi Nessuli adrar sennig sen, amzun d tili, $ilen, s tidep, ara d i$li fellasen. Ïîfet nezzeh ayen i wen Nefka, smektit ed ayen illan degs, amar a pêezzbem

Mi d Iddem Mass ik, si tgeééal n tarwa n Adem, dderya nnsen, Inna yasen a d cehhden $ef yiman nnsen: "day ur Lli$ ara d Mass nnwen"? Nnan: "ih, ncehhed". Akka ur d teqqaôem ara, ass n tnekra: "s tidep, ayagi d ayen ur neéôi
Ne$ a d tinim: "d imezwura nne$ kan i icurken, zik. Nekwni d tarwa deffir sen. Day a$ Ten$ev, ilmend n wayen xedmen wid iôejjnen
Akka ay Nfeûûel issekniyen, amar a d u$alen s abrid
Eêku yasen d tadyant n win iwumi Nefka issekniyen nne£. Irra ten akin. Idda yides Cciîan, iu$al seg wid i$eôqen

Lemmer i £ ihwi, Nessuli t yissen. Maca, ib$a tamurt, idda d lhawiyya s. Ihi, amedya s am win n waydi, ma teddiv p fellas, ad ilehhet, ma teooiv t, ad ilehhet. D wagi ay d amedya n ugdud i iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Eêku d tadyant, amar a d mmektin
Agdud iskaddben issekniyen nne£, d yir amedya. Pddennisen iman nnsen
Win Inha Öebbi, ihi, idda d ubrid. Wid Itlef Öebbi, nitni d imexsuôen

Ni$ Neswejd ed, i Loahennama, aîas n leonun akked yimdanen. Sâan ulawen, ur fehhmen yissen; sâan allen, ur pwalin yissent; sâan imeééu$en, ur sellen yissen. Nitni am lmal, ne$ nnetlafen kteô. Wigi d i$wefliyen
I Öebbi, ismawen ûûam. Naâôet eP, yissen. Veôôfet seg wid issexsaôen ismawen iS. Ad ppuqeîîin $ef wayen xeddmen
Deg wayen Nexleq, yiwen n lois ivfeô tidep. Ipêuddu syis
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, a ten Nawi, cwiî, cwiî, ar wanda ur éôin
Ad asen Fke$ lmudda. Ih, ticeôkep iW d tunûiêt
Day ur d tepmeyyizem ara? Ur illi umeddakwel nnwen d aôehbani. Neppa, d aneddaô kan ipbegginen
Day ur walan ara tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen Ixleq Öebbi n cci? Ni$, ahat, iqeôb ed lajel nnsen. Anwa awal, deffir wagi, ar amnen
Win Itlef Öebbi, ur Isâi nnahi. A ten Ioo ad hemlen di tjehli nnsen

A k steqsayen $ef yimir, melmi ara d yili. Ini: "i t Iéôan siwa Mass iw. D Neppa kan a t id Isseknen, di lweqt is. Ad iaéay di tmurt akked igenwan. Ur kwen id ippawev siwa deqzalla". A k steqsayen amzun tesâiv asali fellas. Ini: "i t Issnen siwa ÔÖebbi", maca tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
Ini: "ur ksibe$ i iman iw, aba$uô ne$ vveôô, kkes ed ayen Irad Öebbi. Lemmer ssine$ tabavnit, ad ôwu$ lxiô, ur iyi ipnal ixmiô. Nek d aneddaô kan, u d abcir, i ugdud iumnen

D Neppa ikwen id Ixelqen si yiwen n yiman. Iddem ed segs tameîîut is, ad izde$ yides. Mi insa yides, tebbwi tadist tafessast; telêa yis. Mi d teûbeê ééayet, naâôen Öebbi: "a Mass nne$! Ma Tefkiv a$ d aâeôvi, war ccekk, a nili seg wid isnemmiren
Mi sen d Ifka aâeôdi, rran aS icriken s wayen i sen d Ifka. I aâlay Öebbi, sennig wayen pcaraken
Day ad carken ayen ur nexliq acemma, u d nitni i ipwaxelqen
Ur zmiren a ten âiwnen, ne$ ad âiwnen iman nnsen
Ma tnecdem ten ar nnhaya, ur teddun yidwen. Iâuva fellawen ma tnecdem ten, ne$ ma tessusmem
S tidep, wigi tnaâôem, war Öebbi, d imdanen am kunwi. Naâret pen, ma ad awen d rren, maday tessawalem tidep

Day sâan ivaôen, ad lêun fellasen, ne$ sâan ifassen, ad ddmen yissen, ne$ sâan allen, ad walin yisent, ne$ sâan imeééu$en, ad slen yissen. Ini: "naâret icriken nnwen, sinna, andit iyi. Ur iyi sganayet
Ih, Bab iw d Öebbi id Issersen Tazmamt, i Iêemmlen lâuûam
Wid tnaâôem, war Neppa, ur zmiren a kwen âawnen, ne$ ad âawnen iman nnsen
Ma tnecdem ten ar nnhaya, ur sellen. A ten twaliv a k id pmuqulen, nitni ur pwalin
Ddem ayen ilhan, ameô ar lewqama, veôôef i wid ur nessin
Ma ilaâj ik Cciîan ar dduni, ppkel $ef Öebbi. Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ih, wid ipêezziben, ma innul iten urbaâ n ccwaîen, a d mmektin, d$a ad asen llint wallen
Zgan $elîen atmaten nnsen, d$a nitni ur xevvun
Ma ur asen d tebbwiv ara assekni, ad ak inin: "acimi ur t id isnulfa ara"? Ini: "teddu$ kan d wayen iyi d ippuweêêan, s$uô Mass iw". Wagi, s$uô Mass nnwen, d tafat, d nnhaya, d aêunu, i ugdud iumnen
Ma qqaôen Leqwôan ssemêesset as, ssusmet, amar fellawen aêunu
Mmekti d Mass ik, deg iman ik, s wannuz akked lxuf, s wawal irsen, taûebêit, tameddit. Ur ppili seg i$wefliyen
Ih, wid illan ar Mass ik, ur sme$wôen ara iman nnsen, $ef uâbad iS. Sbuccuâen T, i Neppa kennun
Steqsan k $ef rrbeê. Ini: "rrbeê i Öebbi akked Umazan. Ihi, êezzbet i Öebbi, elhut garawen, a$et awal i Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Lmumnin d wid kan iwumi ippergigi wul nnsen, ma Ipwabder ed Öebbi. Ma $ôan asen issekniyen iS, ad innerni liman nnsen. £ef Mass nnsen, ay ppeklen
Wid ibedden i téallit, ipûeôôifen seg wayen is iten N$at
Wigi d ûûeê, d lmumnin. I nitni, ar Mass nnsen, tiseddaôin, ssmaê, akked l$it uùkyis
Akken ik id Issuffe$ Mass ik, seg uxxam ik, s tidep, wanag ur ib$i urbaâ si lmumnin
La k pnamaren $ef tidep, deffir ubeggen is, amzun kan pwanehôen ar tmeppant, nitni pêekkiôen
Mi wen Iâahed Öebbi, ara ppili nnwen, yiwet si snat n trebbuyaâ, tessarmem a ppili nnwen tin ur nepwaselleê. Öebbi Ib$a a d itebbet tidep s wawalen iS, ad ôéen wakali ijehliyen
A ppili tidep, ad inqev lbaîel, xas ugin ibe$wviyen
Mi tepprem afus s$uô Mass nnwen, Ijaweb awen d: "Nek ad awen Fke$ agim lmalayek, mestebâant
Irra t kan Öebbi d abecceô iwakken ad nnevmanen yis wulawen nnwen. Ur illi l$elb, siwa s$uô Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Mi kwen I$umm s yives, d îîmana s$uôeS; Isse$li d fellawen aman seg igenni; a kwen Izzizdeg yissen, ad Issebâad, fellawen, a$way n Cciîan, ad Isseohed ulawen nnwen, ad Itebbet, yissen, isurifen
Mi Iweêêa Mass ik i lmalayek: "Nek yidkwent; tebbtemt wid iumnen. Ad Skecme$ tugdi deg ulawen n wid ijehlen. Ewwtemt sennig tmegrav, ewwtemt ar ixfawen ivudan
Ayagi, acku nitni, s tidep, xuûmen Öebbi akked Umazan iS. I win ixuûmen Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ihi, Öebbi Iwâaô deg uâaqeb
Wagi i kunwi, jeôôbet ep! U i ijehliyen, aâaqeb n tmes
A wid iumnen! Ma temmugrem d wid ijehlen la d éeddmen, ur sen reggwlet
Win i sen irewlen, assen, siwa ma la issewjad i umennu$, ne$ ma ikcem s arbaâ, winna, a t immager wurrif n Öebbi; axxam is d Loahennama, a yir tu$alin
Ur ten tennu$em, maca d Öebbi iten Innu$en. Ur teôoimev mi tôeomev, maca Öebbi Iôoem, iwakken ad Ijeôôeb lmumnin s ujeôôeb umâin s$uôeS. Öebbi, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Akka, Ih, Öebbi Issadar ticeôkep ijehliyen
Tessutrem l$elb, atan iusa kwen id. Ma tfukkem, ppif i kunwi. Ma tu$alem, a Nu$al. Ula iwumi tent, bippa, trebbuyaâ nnwen, xas îîuqtent. Ih, Öebbi Idda d lmumnin
A wid iumnen! A$et awal i Öebbi akked Umazan iS. Ur T ppaooat, u kunwi tsellem
Ur ppilit am wid innan: "nesla", nitni ur sellen
£eô Öebbi, s tidep, ineggura imexlaq d iâeééugen, d igugam, ur nfehhem
Lemmer Iéôi Öebbi degsen lxiô, yili Irra ten sellen. Ma Irra ten sellen, war ccekk, ad akwren avaô, u nitni aâûan
A wid iumnen! Jawbet i Öebbi akked Umazan, ma Inced ikwen ar wayen ikwen issidiren. Cfut ar Öebbi Ippili ger umdan akked wul is. £uôeS, Neppa, s tidep, ara tepwafessrem
Ëezzbet i uhewwel. Ur ipêaz ara kan imednas segwen, weêêedsen. Cfut ar Öebbi Iqseê deg uâaqeb
Mmektit ed mi, kunwi, drus ay tellam, d uôhifen di tmurt, teppagwadem a kwen xevfen medden. Iûûeô ikwen, Isellek ikwen s l$elb iS, I$at ikwen s wayen ilhan, amender ma a ppesnemmrem
A wid iumnen! Ur pxeyyinet Öebbi akked Umazan, ur pxeyyinet lamanat nnwen, kunwi teéôam
Cfut ar, ayla nnwen akked tarwa nnwen, d ahewwel kan, u ar £uô Öebbi, ôôaîeb ameqwôaêan
A wid iumnen! Ma têezzbem i Öebbi, ad awen Ifk afraz, ad awen Imêu tucmitin nnwen, ad awen Isemmeê. Öebbi d Bab n lfevl ameqwôaêan
Ma ppandin ak, wid ijehlen, iwakken a k êebsen, ne$ a k n$en, ne$ a k ssuff$en; ppandin u Öebbi Ippandi. Öebbi Yif akw imendayen
Ma $ôan asen issekniyen nne£, ad inin: "ih, nesla. Ma ihwa ya$ a d nini am ayagi. Ayagi, s tidep, siwa d timucuha imezwura
Mi nnan: "a Öebbi, ma illa wagi d tidep s$uôeK, Sse$li d, fella$, id$a$en seg igenni, ne$ Awi a$ d aâaqeb aqeôêan
Ur illi Öebbi d win ara ten Iâaqben, skud telliv garasen. Ur Illi Öebbi d win ara Ipâaqben ma nitni la suturen ssmaê
Acimi ur ten Ipâaqab ara Öebbi, u nitni swexxiôen si Loamaâ n Lêaôam, ur llin d imawlan is. Imawlan is, d wid kan ipêezziben. Maca, tegwti segsen ur éôin
Taéallit nnsen deg Uxxam, siwa aseffeô akked llir. Jeôôbet aâaqeb, $ef wayen tjehhlem
Ih, wid ijehlen pûeôôifen ayla nnsen, iwakken ad veôôfen seg ubrid n Öebbi. A t ûeôôfen, ad asen iu$al d lexsaôa. Sinna, ad ppu$elben. Wid ijehlen ad pwafessren di Loahennama
Iwakken ad Ifrez Öebbi dduni d lâali, ad Irr ixabiten, wa $ef wa, a ten Izdi akw, a ten Irr ar Loahennama. Widak d imexsuôen
Ini i wid ijehlen: "ma fukken, ad awen Isemmeê ayen iâaddan; ma u$alen, ihi, akken tevôa d imezwura
Nna$et pen alamma tfukk lfetna, u iu$al ddin s lekmal is, i Öebbi. Ma êebsen, Öebbi, s tidep, Ipwali ay xeddmen
Ma wexxôen, cfut ar Öebbi d Bab nnwen, Bab amxalef, Asellak amxalef

Akken ib$u yili wayen id t$eltem n cci, cfut amur wis smus n Öebbi akked Umazan iS, akked llzem, igujilen, ime$ban, win d ibbwi ubrid; ma illa tumnem s Öebbi akked wayen id Nessers i umdan nne£, ass n ufraz, ass ideg mlalent snat n trebbuyaâ. Öebbi Izmer i yal cci

Mi tellam di loiha taqôibt, u nitni agwemmav, imnayen seddawat wen, xas temyefkem ppaâud, tzeglem timlilit. Maca, iwakken ad Isâaddi Öebbi lameô ara iâaddin, ad immet win immuten, s ubeggen, ad yidir win idren, s ubeggen. Öebbi, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Mi k ten id Issenâat Öebbi, d takwemmict, di targit ik ... Lemmer ik ten id Issenâat qwan, war ccekk, a pfeclem, a ppemnamarem $ef lameô. Maca, Öebbi Ijbeô ikwen. Ih, Neppa Issen i illan deg idmaren
Mi wen ten Issenâat, mi ten temmugrem, twalam ten d takwemmict. Iééeméi kwen ar tmu$li nnsen, iwakken ad Isâaddi Öebbi lameô ara iâaddin. Ar Öebbi ppu$alen lumuô
A wid iumnen! Ma temmugrem d arbaâ, tebbtet, mmektit ed aîas Öebbi, amar a prebêem
A$et awal i Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ur ppemnamaret. Mulac a pfeclem, a pnegfem. Üebôet! S tidep, Öebbi ar iûebôiyen
Ur ppilit am wid id iff$en s tem$weô, seg ixxamen nnsen, iwakken a ten id walin medden. Swexxiôen seg ubrid n Öebbi. Öebbi Izzi i wayen xeddmen

Mi sen icebbeê Cciîan igiten nnsen, u inna: "ur kwen i$elleb yiwen seg imdanen, ass agi. Nek d amalal nnwen". Mi mwalant snat trebbuyaâ, iuker avaô, inna: "nek xvi$ kwen, nek wala$ ayen ur twalam, nek ugade$ Öebbi. Öebbi Iqseê deg uâaqeb
Mi nnan ixabiten akked imehzulen n wul: "wigi, i$uôô iten ddin nnsen". Win ippeklen $ef Öebbi, ihi, Öebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Lemmer a pwaliv mara ddment lmalayek leôwaê n wid ijehlen, ad kkatent udmawen nnsen, izugar nnsen. "Jeôôbet aâaqeb n tmeô$iwt
Ayagi ilmend n wayen d bbwin ifassen nnwen", u Öebbi ur pdennis imdanen
Am tikli n ugdud n Ferâun akked wid i ten id izwaren. Nekôen issekniyen n Öebbi. Issemêaleq asen Öebbi s ibekkaven nnsen. Ih, Öebbi d Uzmir, Iqseê deg uâaqeb
Akka, acku Öebbi ur Ipbeddil l$it is I$at agdud, alamma bedlen i illan deg iman nnsen. Öebbi Issel, d Amusnaw
Am tikli n ugdud n Ferâun akked wid i ten id izwaren. Skaddben issekniyen n Mass nnsen. Nen$a ten s ibekkaven nnsen, Ne$meq agdud n Ferâun; llan akw d imednas
£uô Öebbi, imexlaq ucmiten mavi, d wid ijehlen, d$a ur uminen
wid ukud tgiv lemâahda, sinna, di yal tikelt, neqven lemâahda nnsen, u nitni ur pêezziben
Ma tugarev ten di îôad, sserwel yissen wid i ten id ivefôen, amar a d mmektin
Ma tugadev lexdaâ seg ugdud, err iten akin, s tezdeg. Öebbi, s tidep, ur Iêemmel ara ixeddaâen
Ur p$ilin menâan, wid ijehlen. Nitni, s tidep, ur zmiren

Heggit asen d ayen iwumi tzemrem n lemêella akked yimnayen, a ppessagwdem yissen acengu n Öebbi, acengu nnwen, akked wiyav, war segsen, ur tessinem; Öebbi Issen iten. Ayen tseddqem n cci, deg ubrid n Öebbi, ad awen d iu$al. Kunwi ur tepwadensem
Ma nudan talwit, nadi ep. Ppkel $ef Öebbi. Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma b$an a k xedâan, ihi, âammed $ef Öebbi, Neppa i k Ifkan afus s tallalt iS, akked lmumnin
Issemlal ulawen nnsen. Lemmer a pûeôfev i illan akw di tmurt, ur tessemliliv ulawen nnsen. Maca, Öebbi Issemlal iten. Neppa, s tidep, d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
A Nnbi! Âammed $ef Öebbi, keçç, akked wid iddan yidek si lmumnin
A Nnbi! Eg lêir i lmumnin, ad nna$en. Ma llan segwen warem iûebôiyen, ad rnun snat twinas. Ma llan segwen twinas, ad rnun agim n wid ijehlen, acku, nitni d agdud ur nfehhem
Tura, Issafes Öebbi fellawen. Iéôa tella garawen rrehma. Ihi, ma llan segwen twinas iûebôiyen, ad rnun snat twinas, ma llan segwen agim, ad rnun sin igima, ma Irad Öebbi. Öebbi ar iûebôiyen
Ur issefk ara i Nnbi ad isâu imeêbas, alamma pwa$elben di tmurt. Teb$am tukci n ddunit. Öebbi Ib$a laxeôt. Öebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Lemmer maççi d ayen iuran s$uô Öebbi, izwar ed, yili a kwen iwwet uâaqeb abarar, ilmend n wayen tebbwim
Eççet ayen ilhan, iêellen, seg wayen i t$elltem, êezzbet i Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
A Nnbi! Ini i wid teîîfem seg imeêbas: "ma Iufa Öebbi lxiô deg ulawen nnwen, ad awen Ifk ayen yifen ayen i wen ipwakksen, ad awen Isemmeê. Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Ma b$an a k xedâan, ni$ iu$ lêal xedâen Öebbi. D$a, Ikkes asen ôôay. Öebbi Iéôa, d Bab n ûûwab

Ih, wid iumnen, iunagen, ijuhden s wayla nnsen, akked yiman nnsen, deg ubrid n Öebbi, wid isnubgten u fkan afus, widak d imeddukwal bwaygarasen.
